LocStringValues.FINISH_EGYPT_3_DESC: Whip boomerangs through several foes at once for double-dealing damage! Complete Ancient Egypt Day 3!
LocStringValues.ACCOUNT_LINK_DESCRIPTION: Linking to a personal account will secure your progress and will allow you to log in on multiple devices.
LocStringValues.ACCOUNT_SIGN_IN_BENEFITS_CLOUD_SAVE: Save your progress for recovery or use on another device
LocStringValues.ADVICE_ALMANAC_FROM_PLANTS: Touch plants on the map for Almanac access as well
LocStringValues.ADVICE_BANANA_TUTORIAL_GOOD_JOB: Great! You can also drag and drop to target attacks
LocStringValues.ADVICE_BANANA_TUTORIAL_SELECT: Tap on the banana to select it
LocStringValues.ADVICE_BANANA_TUTORIAL_SHOOT: Tap to pick target tile for attack
LocStringValues.ADVICE_BOUGHT_PLANTFOOD: If things get rough, stock up on Plant Food!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_BUY_PLANTFOOD: Spend those coins on more Plant Food!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_CHERRY_BOMB_POWERUP: Plant Cherry Bomb to destroy zombies!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_CLICK_COIN: Touch the coin to pick it up!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_CLICK_KEY: Tap on the key to pick it up!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_CLICK_ON_GRASS: Drag a seed packet to the grass!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_CLICK_PEASHOOTER:
Drag a peashooter seed packet
to plant another one!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_CLICK_PLANT: Drag the shovel onto a plant to remove it!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_CLICK_SEED_PACKET: Drag a seed packet to the grass!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_CLICK_SHOVEL:
Those backwards plants are in the way!
Drag the shovel onto a plant to remove it!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_COLLECTED_SUN:
Keep collecting sun! You'll
need it to grow more plants!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_COLLECT_COINS: Collect coins to buy cool stuff later!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_COLLECT_PLANT:
Tap on the plant to add
it to your collection!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_COLLECT_SPROUT: It will be waiting in your Zen Garden.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_COLLECT_SUN: Touch the falling sun to collect!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_DONE_DIGGING: 铲子可以为其他植物腾出空间.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_EARNED_SECOND_STAR:
Good job, Star number two! Stars
are used to unlock cool rewards!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_EARNED_STAR:
You earned a Star by 
surviving a level!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_ENCOURAGE_BUTTER_POWERUP: Use Butter to stop zombies for a few seconds!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_ENCOURAGE_MOVEVASE_POWERUP: Use Move to relocate vases to protected lanes!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_ENCOURAGE_REVEAL_POWERUP: Reveal Vase helps you plan your next move!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_ENOUGH_SUN:
Excellent! You've collected
enough sun for your next plant!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_ESCAPEROOT_CANT_PLANT_HERE: Escape Roots can't swap to where they can't be planted.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_ESCAPEROOT_CANT_SWAP_AFFECTED_PLA: Escape Roots can't swap captured or transformed plants.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_ESCAPEROOT_CANT_SWAP_PLANTFOODED_: Escape Roots can't swap a plant using Plant Food.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_ESCAPEROOT_CANT_SWAP_THIS_PLANT: Escape Roots can't swap with that plant.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_GET_MORE_STARS: More Stars are unlocked! Replay levels to get them!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_GOTO_UNIVERSE_VIEW: You finished Egypt! Tap the Universe Button!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_GRAVEBUSTERS_ON_GRAVES: Grave Busters can only be planted on graves
LocStringValues.ADVICE_HOTPOTATO_ONLY_ON_ICEBLOCKS: Hot Potato can only be planted on ice blocks.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_HOTPOTATO_ONLY_ON_ICEBLOCKS_OR_SQ: Hot Potato can only be planted on ice blocks or octopuses.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_HUGE_WAVE: A HUGE WAVE OF ZOMBIES IS APPROACHING!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_INTENSIVECARROT_NOT_ON_PREVIOUSLY: You can only plant this on defeated plants.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_KEEP_DIGGING:
Keep digging until your
lawn is clear of plants!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_KEEP_DIGGING_2:
Keep digging until your
lawn is clear of plants!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_KEEP_USING_POWERUPS: Keep using Power Ups to protect your brains!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_MAGNIFYING_GRASS_SUN: Generate plenty of sun to power your attacks
LocStringValues.ADVICE_MORE_LEVELS_TO_PLAY: Remember, there are still levels to play in other Worlds
LocStringValues.ADVICE_MORE_SUNFLOWERS:
The more sunflowers you have,
the faster you can grow plants!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_NOT_ENOUGH_SUN: 你需要收集更多的阳光去种植那株植物!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_NOT_ON_LILYPAD: 地下的植物不能种在莲叶上.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_NO_BANANA_ON_RAILCART: 香蕉对矿车来说太滑了.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_NO_ESCAPEROOT_ON_RAILCART: 逃脱树根不能种在矿车上.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_NO_JACKOLANTERN_ON_RAILCART: 杰克南瓜灯不能种在矿车上.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_NO_MISSILETOE_ON_RAILCART: 槲寄冰对矿车来说太凉了.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PEASHOOTER_DIED:
One of your peashooters died!
Try planting them further to the left!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANTED_PEASHOOTER:
Nicely done! You can also plant by tapping
the seed packet and then the lawn
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANTING_NEEDS_GROUND: Spikeweeds can only be planted on solid ground
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_BOWLING_FOUL_LINE: Place your bulb to the left of the line
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_FOOD_BANK_FULL: Plant Food full! Use one before picking up more.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_FOOD_NOT_SIMULTANEOUS: Plant Food would create too many plants
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_LILYPADS_ON_WET: 莲叶只能种在海岸线的右侧
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_NOT_ON_FISHERMAN: 你不能种在渔夫僵尸上
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_NOT_ON_KING: 你不能种在国王僵尸上
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_NOT_ON_TIDE: 你不能把这个种在海上
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_ONLY_ON_WAVES: 水生植物只能种植在水里
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_SUNFLOWER1: 向日葵是非常重要的植物!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_SUNFLOWER2: 尝试尽可能多地种植它们!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_SUNFLOWER3: 尝试尽可能多地种植它们!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_SUNFLOWER4: 尝试尽可能多地种植它们!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_TANGLEKELP_ON_LILYPAD: 缠绕水草只能种在水里
LocStringValues.ADVICE_PLANT_TOO_MANY_PLANTS: You are at your planting limit! Shovel a plant to plant more.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_POTATOMINE_ON_PLANKS: Underground plants cannot be planted on planks.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_POWERPLANT_ON_POWERTILE: Tile Turnip cannot be planted on a Power Tile
LocStringValues.ADVICE_READY_TO_UNLOCK_WORLD: Use World Keys to unlock new Worlds
LocStringValues.ADVICE_RETURN_TO_UNIVERSE_VIEW: You have a World Key! Tap to view Time-Space Map
LocStringValues.ADVICE_SEED_REFRESH:
Seeds need time to refresh
before planting again
LocStringValues.ADVICE_START_NEW_LEVEL: Tap on the new Level to start it!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_STAR_CHALLENGES_UNLOCKED: More Stars are available in many completed levels.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_SUNBOMBS_EXPLODE: Explosions can damage plants and zombies
LocStringValues.ADVICE_SUNBOMBS_WAIT: Wait for Sun Bombs to land to collect the sun
LocStringValues.ADVICE_SUN_BOMBS_TRIGGERED: Patience and precision are needed in Sun Bomb levels.
LocStringValues.ADVICE_SUN_BOMBS_WARNING: Wait for Sun Bombs to land or they will explode on touch
LocStringValues.ADVICE_SWAP_PLANTS: Swap plants to make matches of three!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_TAP_BUTTER_POWERUP: Tap on the Butter 僵尸 Power Up!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_TAP_EGYPT: Looks like you need more Stars. Tap back to Egypt!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_TAP_MOVEVASE_POWERUP: Tap on the Move Vase Power Up!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_TAP_REVEAL_POWERUP: Tap on the Reveal Vase Power Up!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_TILE_PLANTS_ON_TILES: Tile plants cannot be planted on existing tiles
LocStringValues.ADVICE_TURBO_BUTTON_OFF: Tap an active Turbo button to turn it off
LocStringValues.ADVICE_TURBO_BUTTON_ON: Tap the Turbo button to activate it
LocStringValues.ADVICE_USE_BUTTER_POWERUP: Tap the zombie to butter it!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_USE_FLICK: Swipe your finger across a zombie
LocStringValues.ADVICE_USE_FLICK_BETTER: Swipe the zombie in the direction you want it to move!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_USE_MAGNIFYING_GRASS: Tap to spend sun on attack
LocStringValues.ADVICE_USE_MOVEVASE_POWERUP_SELECT_LOCAT: Move the vase to the row protected by Repeaters!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_USE_PINCH: Pinch your fingers on a zombie
LocStringValues.ADVICE_USE_PINCH_BETTER: Pinch your fingers right over the zombie!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_USE_WIZARDFINGER: Hold your finger down near your target
LocStringValues.ADVICE_USE_WIZARDFINGER_BETTER: Make sure to hold your finger on the screen!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_VASEBREAKER_TUTORIAL_1: Tap on a vase to see what's inside!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_VASEBREAKER_TUTORIAL_2: Destroy all zombies and vases to complete the level!
LocStringValues.ADVICE_WAIT_TO_UNLOCK_WORLD: World Keys can unlock new Worlds when they are available
LocStringValues.ADVICE_ZOMBIE_ONSLAUGHT: Don't let the zombies reach your house!
LocStringValues.AILMINT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}{STAT}Note: Garlimite only has two tiers

{FLAVOR}"Garlic is formed from multiple of us, but he actually doesn't know about it! Every time we try to acknowledge him, he splits into another 8 of us!"
LocStringValues.AILMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Garlimites divert zombies that ate them into other lanes. They have very low health, so use them as instants.
LocStringValues.AKEE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}子弹每次弹射都将衰减5点伤害

{FLAVOR}Autonomous Katapulting Ejectomatic Emitter is actively looking for a different acronym for A.K.E.E. because let's face it, "Katapulting" is just not working.
LocStringValues.AKEE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 阿开木木向僵尸发射可以减速的弹射子弹.
LocStringValues.AKEE_TOOLTIP: 向僵尸发射可以减速的弹射子弹
LocStringValues.ALOE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}当前方的植物生命值低于75%时, 为其治疗

{FLAVOR}Aloe likes to soothe. He likes to alleviate, he likes to restore, he likes to mend. But don't ask him to revive. He's touchy about revival.
LocStringValues.ALOE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 芦荟可以治疗受伤的植物.
LocStringValues.APPLEMORTAR_DESCRIPTION: Things Apple Mortar does in his free time include: Indulging in friendly rivalry with Melon-pult, practicing trick shots with Nightshade and sharpening his apple core. He's a prideful plant with an explosive personality, and others are glad to befriend him... That's what he thought, at least.
LocStringValues.APPLEMORTAR_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 苹果迫击炮发射苹果核, 对三条线上的僵尸造成小范围伤害!
LocStringValues.APP_UPDATE_REQUIRED: Download the latest version of PVZ2 from the App Store to continue.
LocStringValues.ARCADE_DIALOG_FOOTER: Unlock Power Ups to use in Endless!
LocStringValues.ARMAMINT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上

{FLAVOR}Diagnosed with farsightedness at a young age, Wheat Slinger has a bit more difficulty when it comes to reading books and playing catch with his older pult brothers - a long-running family tradition. He wants to wear glasses due to his eyes, but he's afraid of his brothers laughing at him being a nerd.
LocStringValues.ARMAMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 小麦向5格前的目标发射8发子弹.
LocStringValues.ARMAMINT_TOOLTIP: 向5格前的目标投射子弹
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_DANGER_ROOM_COWBOY: Access to the Big Bad Butte!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_DANGER_ROOM_EGYPT: Access to the Pyramid of Doom!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_DANGER_ROOM_GENERIC: Survive level after level of escalating zombie attacks. Test your skills in this Endless Zone.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_DANGER_ROOM_MODERN: Access to Highway to the Danger Room!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_FIRSTKEY_DESCRIPTION: It's an ancient key.  Now all you need is an ancient lock.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_LAWN_MOWER_TRIGGERED: ONE OR MORE LAWN MOWERS WERE TRIGGERED!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_MAPGADGET_DESCRIPTION: A parchment of ancient lands, with cosmic implications.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_MONEYBAG_DESCRIPTION_01: Like your head is full of brains, this bag is full of coins!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_MONEYBAG_DESCRIPTION_02: Coins, coins, coins! For all your Power Up and Plant Food needs!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_MONEYBAG_DESCRIPTION_03: It's better than a bag of imps, there are coins!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_MONEYBAG_DESCRIPTION_04: Sorry, your epic bag of infinite coins was on another zombie.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_MONEYBAG_DESCRIPTION_05: A coin in the bag is way better than looking a gift zombie in the mouth.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_POWERUPGADGET_DESCRIPTION: Use only in a jam. Do not use if quality seal is broken.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_POWERUP_TITLE: Crazy Dave's jar of preserved powers
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_POWERUP_VASEBREAKERBUTTER_D: Butters a single 僵尸 in Vasebreaker
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_POWERUP_VASEBREAKERREVEAL_D: Reveals the contents of one Vase in Vasebreaker
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDKEY_DESCRIPTION: Use to unlock new Worlds and travel to other times!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_BEACH: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Sharktronic Sub.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_COWBOY: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot War Wagon.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_DARK: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Dark Dragon.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_DINO: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Dinotronic Mechasaur.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_EGYPT: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Sphinx-inator.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_EIGHTIES: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Multi-stage Masher.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_FUTURE: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Tomorrow-tron.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_ICEAGE: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Tuskmaster 10,000 BC.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_LOSTCITY: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' invention, the Zombot Aerostatic Gondola.
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_MODERN: You have acquired a taco with a waffle in it!
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_MODERN_TITLE: Taco With a Waffle In It
LocStringValues.AWARD_SCREEN_WORLDTROPHY_PIRATE: You have defeated Dr. Zomboss' creation, the Zombot Plank Walker.
LocStringValues.BANANA_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}用法: {STAT}点击一次瞄准, 再点击一次发射

{FLAVOR}It's important to avoid stereotyping as much as possible. Stereotypes are often flat-out wrong. And also hurtful. But honestly ... Banana Launcher is TOTALLY bananas.
LocStringValues.BANANA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 香蕉火箭炮可以向地图上任意一格发射炮弹, 对3x3范围内的僵尸造成大量伤害.
LocStringValues.BEACH_LEVEL_NAME: 巨浪沙滩 - 第 {LEVEL_NUMBER} 天
LocStringValues.BLOOMERANG_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}每一击都会使僵尸定身0.15秒

{FLAVOR}As the first new member to your home defense team, Bloomerang enjoys long walkabouts with his friend, Koala Bear, and listening to his Bob Barley albums out back.
LocStringValues.BLOOMERANG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 回旋镖射手可以攻击一条线上的最多三个目标, 两次!
LocStringValues.BLOOMERANG_TOOLTIP: 攻击并定身最多3个目标, 两次
LocStringValues.BLOOMINGHEARTS_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对命中过的目标伤害会逐渐递增 (每次+5, 最多+120)

{FLAVOR}Blooming Heart loves zombies. She gets guff from her fellow plants over it, but she stands firm. She's into zombies and makes no apologies about it.
LocStringValues.BLOOMINGHEARTS_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 绽放之心向僵尸们投掷花朵, 并短暂定身他们
LocStringValues.BLOOMINGHEARTS_TOOLTIP: 投射具有定身效果, 伤害逐渐递增的花朵
LocStringValues.BLOVER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The luckiest stunt clover around, Blover is the most recent recipient of the Stunty Award. You can see his work in "Bulb Fiction," "Rooty," and "Finding Flower." He also teaches a stunt class on Tuesdays at the community center.
LocStringValues.BLOVER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Blovers instantly blow away all zombies in the air.
LocStringValues.BLOVER_TOOLTIP: Blows away all flying and floating zombies
LocStringValues.BOMBARDMINT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}只能在夜晚关卡使用
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}不能被模仿

{FLAVOR}Brought into all these time-traveling shenanigans, Ice-shroom has become shier and more withdrawn - you can't even see his face clearly as he hid it so well! When asked, he just said in a gruff voice: "I'm just scared of meeting new plants ok? Paralyzed facial nerves, remember?"
LocStringValues.BOMBARDMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 寒冰菇冰冻全屏的僵尸, 然后消失.
LocStringValues.BOMBEGRANATE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Bombegranate is fierce and a go-getter. She will always try to be one step ahead of everyone else. Sometimes, she even wishes that she could multiply herself with her seeds, so she can do even MORE things with a bunch of mini-Bombe! Alas, she wouldn't trade her sentinel seeds for anything else in the world - she loves them too much for that.
LocStringValues.BOMBEGRANATE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 爆炸石榴在3x3范围内爆炸, 并留下可以伤害僵尸的种子.
LocStringValues.BOMBEGRANATE_TOOLTIP: 爆炸并留下可以伤害僵尸的种子
LocStringValues.BONKCHOY_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}A freelance dentist on the side, he's offering a 特点 this month - he'll knock two of your teeth out for the price of one!
LocStringValues.BONKCHOY_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 菜问可以快速攻击前方或后方的敌人.
LocStringValues.BONKCHOY_TOOLTIP: 快速攻击前方或后方的敌人
LocStringValues.BOOST_ALREADY_ACTIVE: This plant is already boosted! Use it in a level!
LocStringValues.BOOST_DETAIL_FIRST_STRIKE: Gets free Plant Food effect when planted. This boost lasts for 1 level.
LocStringValues.BOWLINGBULB_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}前方3x1范围内有僵尸才会攻击

{FLAVOR}Guess which team has won the League Championship for five years running now? Team Bowling Bulb, that's who. They are on a ROLL. You and your pals think you got what it takes to stop 'em? Yeah, sure. Keep dreamin, bub.
LocStringValues.BOWLINGBULB_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 发射可以在僵尸之间弹射的保龄球.
LocStringValues.BOWLINGBULB_TOOLTIP: 保龄球可以在僵尸之间弹射
LocStringValues.CABBAGEPULT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cabbage-pult received his doctorate in pulting from Harvest University. He knows a thing or two about launching his way to the top. He also makes a mean soup.
LocStringValues.CABBAGEPULT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 卷心菜投手向敌人投掷卷心菜.
LocStringValues.CABBAGEPULT_TOOLTIP: 投射可以越过障碍物的卷心菜
LocStringValues.CACTUS_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}前方4x3范围内有僵尸才会攻击
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}僵尸靠近时法国

{FLAVOR}Things have really changed for Cactus lately. Book deals, movies, truck show appearances... she's just trying to focus on staying humble and launching thorns like always.
LocStringValues.CACTUS_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 仙人掌的刺可以穿透5个目标!
LocStringValues.CACTUS_TOOLTIP: 发射穿透的针刺, 或躲进地里伤害敌人
LocStringValues.CAMEL_MINIGAME_TUTORIAL_1: Tap on a zombie to flip its panel
LocStringValues.CAMEL_MINIGAME_TUTORIAL_2: Great! Now tap on another one
LocStringValues.CAMEL_MINIGAME_TUTORIAL_3: Awesome! Keep matching symbols to win the game
LocStringValues.CANNON_TUTORIAL_1: Tap on the coconut cannon to make it fire
LocStringValues.CANNON_TUTORIAL_2: Great! Now blow up as many zombies as you can
LocStringValues.CAULIPOWER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}不会魅惑巨人僵尸
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上

{FLAVOR}A general misconception is that his eyes are spinning because of him casting too many spells. See, Caulipower enjoys writing books in his spare time. One day, he thought of a really great ending for his latest novel... but he was afraid that his cousin won't understand it. He has been trying to fix the part since then, and it gave him so much of a headache that his eyes started spinning with distress!
LocStringValues.CAULIPOWER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 超能花菜随机魅惑僵尸, 优先魅惑一般僵尸.
LocStringValues.CELERYSTALKER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻

{FLAVOR}Celery Stalker resents the implication that there's anything unsavory about his attack style. He simply believes that discretion is the better part of vegetation.
LocStringValues.CELERYSTALKER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 潜伏芹菜等待僵尸经过, 然后起身背刺僵尸.
LocStringValues.CELLULAR_PERMISSION_BODY: Do you want to use cellular data to download additional content? You can change this setting in the options menu later.
LocStringValues.CHARDGUARD_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}You might remember Chard Guard from his days in the WWF (that's World Wrestling Foliage). When he was in the ring - boy-oh-boy - he was something to behold! His moves! His style! His attitude! The crowd loved him. He was quite the star for a while there. Sure, those days are behind him. But if you watch carefully, when Chard Guard is fighting zombies, you'll see him use the wrestling move he made famous. The ol' Knock 'Em Dead maneuver - it gets 'em every time.
LocStringValues.CHARDGUARD_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 甜菜护卫可以把僵尸扔回去3次.
LocStringValues.CHERRY_BOMB_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The Cherry Bomb Brothers attempted to start their own band. "We tried to figure out what the sound would be, but we kept explodonating speakers, stages, fans, and of course, zombies. Look for our LP next year."
LocStringValues.CHERRY_BOMB_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 樱桃炸弹在3x3的范围内爆炸. 尽可能把它们种的离僵尸近一些.
LocStringValues.CHILIBEAN_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}吃掉它的僵尸会死亡, 并会放出定身气体
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}has no effect on most mechs

{FLAVOR}He's not blushing, he's trying to hold it in.
LocStringValues.CHILIBEAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 巴豆会引起严重的肠胃疼痛.
LocStringValues.CHILIBEAN_TOOLTIP: 消灭吃掉它的僵尸, 并让他们放出气体
LocStringValues.CHOMPER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}对某些不能吃掉的僵尸造成每口200伤害

{FLAVOR}Everyone appreciates what Chomper does. His appetite has saved them on numerous occasions. But truth be told, Chomper's friends think that eating zombies is gross. And his breath! No one has the heart to tell him, and he never gets the hint when you offer him a mint.
LocStringValues.CHOMPER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Chompers can devour a zombie whole, but take a while to chew and are vulnerable while chewing.
LocStringValues.CHOMPER_TOOLTIP: Devours a zombie, then chews on it for a while
LocStringValues.CITRON_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}As the owner and primary user of "Vitamin C-U-Later" 20-hour energy shots, Citron is always on and always ready for action. "Let's make this happen!!"
LocStringValues.CITRON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 充能柚子发射强大的离子球.
LocStringValues.COCONUTCANNON_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}用法: {STAT}点击开火

{FLAVOR}Sure, he's a hairy old man, but Coconut Cannon can still fire on all cylinders. The reason he's so hairy: he's in-between waxings.
LocStringValues.COCONUTCANNON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 椰子加农炮发射爆炸的椰子炮，在2x1范围内造成爆炸伤害.
LocStringValues.COCONUTCANNON_TOOLTIP: 点击以发射爆炸的椰子炮
LocStringValues.COIN_STORE_TEXT: Low on coins? Convert gems to coins!
LocStringValues.COLDSNAPDRAGON_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻

{FLAVOR}Cold Snapdragon gets chilly when anyone brings up his cousin Snapdragon. "We just view temperature very differently, and I'd really rather not discuss it," he says. Yikes.
LocStringValues.COLDSNAPDRAGON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 冰龙草向前方2x3范围内喷吐寒气.
LocStringValues.COLDSNAPDRAGON_TOOLTIP: 向前方2x3范围内喷吐寒气
LocStringValues.CONCEALMINT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上

{FLAVOR}Shadow Leaf ducks ninja-like out of the party without telling a soul. "Where's Shadow Leaf?" ask the other plants. They don't know. Nobody does. Shadow Leaf is just that sneaky.
LocStringValues.CONCEALMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Shadow Leaves instantly power up shadow plants in a large area.
LocStringValues.CONTAINMINT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"Go easy, there," says Contain-mint. "No need to be in such a rush all the time. Movement is totally overrated."
LocStringValues.CONTAINMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Contain-mints stun all zombies on the board and provide a temporary boost to all Contain-mint Family plants on the lawn.
LocStringValues.CONTINUE_GAME_OR_RESTART: Do you want to continue your current game or restart the level?
LocStringValues.CONVERSION_KEY_DESCRIPTION:
Your progress and rewards have been preserved. Your unused keys have been turned into coins!

{COINT_AMT} Coins!
LocStringValues.CONVERSION_REWARDS_DESCRIPTION:
Updating your progress has given you new rewards!

Details are available in the Almanac.
LocStringValues.CONVERSION_SPLASH_DESCRIPTION:
- Travel to new worlds faster.
- NEW Turbo speed feature.
- Gargantuar battles in every world.
LocStringValues.CONVERSION_STARS_DESCRIPTION:
Your progress and rewards have been preserved. Plant costumes have been awarded to you for the extra Stars you've earned.

{COSTUME_AMT} New Costumes!
LocStringValues.CONVERSION_WORLDKEY_DESCRIPTION: You've been awarded a World Key for your progress in the game. Use it to unlock the world of your choice!
LocStringValues.COPA_PICTURE_WARNING: Your photo will only be saved to this device.
LocStringValues.COWBOY_MINIGAME_TUTORIAL_1: 种植豌豆射手以开始游戏
LocStringValues.COWBOY_MINIGAME_TUTORIAL_2: 种植回旋镖以开始游戏
LocStringValues.COWBOY_MINIGAME_TUTORIAL_3: 种植玉米投手以开始游戏
LocStringValues.CREDITS_COPYRIGHT:
PVZ2, 2018 Electronic Arts Inc. PVZ, PopCap, EA and the EA logo are trademarks of Electronic Arts Inc. 
VISIT US AT: WWW.POPCAP.COM
SUPPORT: www.POPCAP.com/help.php
LocStringValues.CREDITS_PVZ_TITLE:
PVZ2:
It's About Time
by PopCap and Electronic Arts
LocStringValues.DAILY_ACTIVITIES_DESC: Complete Daily Activities for fruitful rewards!
LocStringValues.DANDELION_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}飓风甘蓝可以使它放出大量子弹, 但需要时间恢复

{FLAVOR}"Look," says Dandelion, shaking his head. "I'm not a leprechaun and I'm not a genie. You can blow my seeds off all you want, but I can't make your wish come true. I don't even know how that rumor got started."
LocStringValues.DANDELION_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 蒲公英向三条线发射炸弹, 每条线一次.
LocStringValues.DANDELION_TOOLTIP: 向三条线发射炸弹, 每条线一次.
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_COWBOY_TITLE_WELCOME: Welcome to the Big Bad Butte!
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_EGYPT_TITLE_WELCOME: Welcome to the Pyramid of Doom!
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_FUTURE_TITLE_WELCOME: Welcome to the Terror from Tomorrow!
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_MODERN_LEVEL_NAME: Highway to the Danger Room - Level {LEVEL_NUMBER}
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_MODERN_TITLE_WELCOME: Welcome to Highway to the Danger Room!
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_FLAME_THROWER: Adds a free use of Power Flame
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_FLICK_ZOMBIE: Adds a free use of Power Toss
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_FOURTH_CARD_DESC: Use coins to show fourth choice
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_MOWER_DESC: Restores up to {MOWER_COUNT} missing lawn mowers at the start of the level
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_MOWER_DESC_SINGULAR: Restores one missing lawn mower at the start of the level
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_PLANTFOOD_DESC: Starts you off with {PF_COUNT} extra Plant Foods
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_PLANTFOOD_DESC_SINGUL: Starts you off with an extra Plant Food
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_SNOWBALL: Adds a free use of Power Snow
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_SUN_DESC: Starts you off with an extra {SUN_COUNT} sun
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_REWARD_WIZARD_FINGER: Adds a free use of Power Zap
LocStringValues.DANGER_ROOM_TITLE_PICK_REWARD: Select a card to add to your progression!
LocStringValues.DARKAGES_LEVEL_NAME: 黑暗时代 - 第 {LEVEL_NUMBER} 夜
LocStringValues.DELETING_CHILD_PROFILES_INFO: By not allowing additional profiles, this will delete your non-primary profiles.  Are you sure you want to do that?
LocStringValues.DIALOG_SKIP_TUTORIAL: Would you like to play through the fundamentals of Plants vs. 僵尸?
LocStringValues.DIALOG_TURBO_DESCRIPTION: The Turbo button speeds up your game. Faster sun, faster plants, and faster zombies!
LocStringValues.DINO_LEVEL_NAME: 恐龙危机 - 第 {LEVEL_NUMBER} 天
LocStringValues.DOWNLOAD_ERROR_UPDATE_UNAVAILABLE: No update available at this time. Please try again later.
LocStringValues.DOWNLOAD_FAILED_BODY: Could not retrieve update information. Check that you are connected to the internet or try again at another time.
LocStringValues.DUSKLOBBER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}被强化的幽暮投手可以向三条路同时发动攻击
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}不会被僵尸啃食(会被砸击, 碾压)
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻

{FLAVOR}Lobbing comes easily to Dusk Lobber, but that's only because she's had extensive training and really enjoys parabolas.
LocStringValues.DUSKLOBBER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 幽暮投手投射具有溅射效果的子弹.
LocStringValues.DUSKLOBBER_TOOLTIP: 投射具有溅射效果的子弹, 在暗影形态下范围更大
LocStringValues.EGYPT_LEVEL_NAME: 神秘埃及 - 第 {LEVEL_NUMBER} 天
LocStringValues.EIGHTIES_LEVEL_NAME: Neon Mixtape Tour - 第 {LEVEL_NUMBER} 天
LocStringValues.ELECTRICBLUEBERRY_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}targets Gargantuars last

{FLAVOR}Electric Blueberry prides herself on being eclectic as well as electric. "I like to keep 'em guessing," she says. "A zombie should always be like, 'Whoa, didn't see that coming,
					' when it's disintegrated."
LocStringValues.ELECTRICBLUEBERRY_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Electric Blueberries create thunderclouds that electrocute random zombies, prioritizing 特点 zombies first.
LocStringValues.ELECTRICCURRANT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Zap Cooldown: {STAT}0.23s -- 0.16s -- 0.12s

{FLAVOR}"Electricity is all very well and fine as a phenomenon," says Electric Currant, "but electromagnetism as a whole is where it's really at."
LocStringValues.ELECTRICCURRANT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Electric Currants create electrical fences between ones planted on the same row or column.
LocStringValues.ELECTRICCURRANT_TOOLTIP: Creates electric fences & zaps eating zombies
LocStringValues.ELECTRICPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Zap Cooldown: {STAT}0.22s -- 0.19s -- 0.16s

{FLAVOR}As the latest member of the Electric Family, he's all about puns and jokes. But in battle, he's all serious and concentrated. To him, their resistance is futile, and they'd better be shocked about his ability. But, at the end of the day, he just wants to get back to his ohm sweet home, eat some light snacks and learn watt are the current jokes.
LocStringValues.ELECTRICPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Electric Peas fire pea-like orbs that pass through zombies and crackle with electrical power, doing damage all the while.
LocStringValues.EMPEA_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}不能被模仿

{FLAVOR}Has grown tired of people lazily calling him E.M. Pea. "There's a C and H there for a reason people! And I've got the stone to prove it!"
LocStringValues.EMPEA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: E.M.Peaches instantly explode, disabling all machines and fast zombies in an area.
LocStringValues.EMPEA_TOOLTIP: Disables all machines and fast zombies in an area
LocStringValues.ENCHANTMINT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"I just love musical theater," says Enchant-mint. Yeah, it doesn't have much to do with magic or his abilities or strategic strengths, but it's a fact. He just likes the songs.
LocStringValues.ENCHANTMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Enchant-mints randomly hypnotize a number of zombies and provide a temporary boost to all Encahnt-mint Family plants on the lawn.
LocStringValues.ENDURIAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"When other plants talk about me, they say I'm too gruff. They say I'm difficult to approach, that I'm afraid to let others get too close to me. Also, I smell terrible," said Endurian. But deep down inside, he knows that he's so much more than that. He's also short-tempered.
LocStringValues.ENDURIAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Endurians are defensive plants that deal damage to zombies attacking them.
LocStringValues.ENDURIAN_TOOLTIP: Defends while dealing damage to zombies attacking it.
LocStringValues.ENLIGHTENMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: This literally does nothing. Well, maybe for decoration and flexing only.
LocStringValues.ENTER_UNIQUE_PLAYER_NAME: The name you entered is already being used.  Please enter a unique player name.
LocStringValues.EPIC_QUEST_AWARD_BODY: Keep an eye out for more Epic Quests!
LocStringValues.EPIC_QUEST_DESC: Some super crunchy Epic Quest Placeholder text YEAHHHHH!!!
LocStringValues.EPIC_QUEST_LEVELGEN_DESC: Play a fresh crop of inzane, organically-grown levels each day!
LocStringValues.EPIC_QUEST_STEP_1_TITLE: Complete each step in the Quest chain for an awesome reward.
LocStringValues.ESCAPEROOT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}用法: {STAT} tap Escape Root and another plant to swap them

{FLAVOR}The other plants put on a big surprise party for Escape Root last week, but he did his thing and suddenly it was a surprise party... FOR THEM!
LocStringValues.ESCAPEROOT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 点击逃脱树根和另一个植物以交换这两个植物的位置.
LocStringValues.ESCAPEROOT_TOOLTIP: Can be swapped with other plants
LocStringValues.EXIT_DANGER_ROOM_BODY: Are you sure that you want to leave? Doing so will end your game.
LocStringValues.EXPLODEONUT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"I was once the champion of the League Championship in bowling, that was five years ago...", says Explode-O-Nut, "and then, the Bulb team from the Northern Shores showed up. I kept trying, harder and harder", but all that effort got him nowhere near to them. "We haven't really talked much since we met each other. They are good kids, though". At least, all that training gave him the most unique talent in the field he now has - a body full of nitroglycerine that's ready to be unleashed anytime!
LocStringValues.EXPLODEONUT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 爆炸坚果被消灭时会自爆.
LocStringValues.FAILED_CANNON_MINIGAME:
PENNY IS
NOT IMPRESSED
WITH YOUR SCORE!
LocStringValues.FILAMINT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Fila-mint hovers enigmatically and electrically over the lawn, surveying his surroundings. He nods, once. It is good.
LocStringValues.FILAMINT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Fila-mints do electric damage and provide a temporary boost to all Fila-mint Family plants on the lawn.
LocStringValues.FIREPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}has a chance to shoot plasma peas that do more damage
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻, 温暖周围的植物

{FLAVOR}Fire Pea knows that what she does looks exciting. But working with an open flame is serious and, more importantly, dangerous business.  That's why, in her spare time, she talks to children about the importance of fire safety. "I'm a trained professional," she explains. "Don't try this at home, kids."
LocStringValues.FIREPEASHOOTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 火焰豌豆射手发射火焰豌豆.
LocStringValues.FIREPEASHOOTER_TOOLTIP: 发射火焰豌豆, 并温暖周围的植物
LocStringValues.FORCE_RESTORE_PURCHASES_BODY: This item has been purchased before. Restore Purchases will allow you to claim all of your past purchases in any profile.
LocStringValues.FUMESHROOM_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"I think of myself as a pretty confident shroom and an all-around fungi," says Fume-shroom. "But sometimes, when I'm eating Plant Food, I hear them chuckling. I hear them calling me 'Balloon-shroom'. I don't think they know how much that hurts."
LocStringValues.FUMESHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 大喷菇喷射烟雾对5x1范围内的僵尸造成伤害.
LocStringValues.FUMESHROOM_TOOLTIP: 喷射具有群攻能力的喷雾
LocStringValues.FUTURE_LEVEL_NAME: 遥远未来 - 第 {LEVEL_NUMBER} 天
LocStringValues.GAMECENTER_FAILED_DESCRIPTION: You must connect to Game Center to access achievements and leaderboards.
LocStringValues.GARLIC_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Good against zombies, as well as proof against any vampires who might accidentally wander by.
LocStringValues.GARLIC_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Garlics divert zombies that ate them into other lanes.
LocStringValues.GEMS_STORE_TEXT: Low on gems? Convert coins to gems!
LocStringValues.GHOSTPEPPER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}30秒后自爆, 对3x3范围内的僵尸造成260伤害
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can phase through a few objects

{FLAVOR}You might not know it looking at her, but Ghost Pepper didn't always wear that white sheet everywhere she went. She first put it on as a lark for a Halloween party one year. Everyone else had these elaborate costumes, and she thought it would be funny to dress like a plain ol' ghost. But she fell in love with that costume. It spoke to her. She'd found her calling.
LocStringValues.GHOSTPEPPER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 幽灵辣椒恐吓整条线上的僵尸.
LocStringValues.GHOSTPEPPER_TOOLTIP: 恐吓整条线上的僵尸, 一段时间后爆炸
LocStringValues.GOLDBLOOM_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}生产量: {STAT}375
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}不能被模仿

{FLAVOR}"Your botanists were so preoccupied with whether they could," says Gold Bloom, about nothing and to nobody in particular, "they didn't stop to think if they should."
LocStringValues.GOLDBLOOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 黄金蓓蕾快速生产出大量阳光.
LocStringValues.GOLDLEAF_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}黄金地砖生产量: {STAT}50 阳光 / 24秒

{FLAVOR}"For a small initial investment, you too can generate huge sun," says Gold Leaf. She's a firm believer in solar markets.
LocStringValues.GOLDLEAF_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 黄金叶可以制造一块黄金地砖.
LocStringValues.GOOGLE_PLAY_FAILED_DESCRIPTION: You must connect to Google Play to access achievements and leaderboards.
LocStringValues.GOT_A_POWERUP: You got a new POWER UP!
LocStringValues.GRAPESHOT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"Spa-BOOM!" enthuses Grapeshot. "You like that? I got a million of 'em! Wa-POW!  Buh-BLAM! Za-... um... Ker-... hmmm... Okay, I guess I've only got the three."
LocStringValues.GRAPESHOT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Grapeshots instantly explode and scatter bouncing projectiles in eight directions.
LocStringValues.GRAPESHOT_TOOLTIP: 爆炸并散射出弹射子弹
LocStringValues.GRAVEBUSTER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}deals damage to nearby grid items when finished
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上

{FLAVOR}He may appear spiky or ill-tempered, but Grave Buster just wants to give you a big hug. Unless you're a puppy. He's terrified of those.
LocStringValues.GRAVEBUSTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 噬碑藤可以消灭一个墓碑.
LocStringValues.GRIMROSE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}对非特殊僵尸造成伤害
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}被强化时可以多拖下2个
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻

{FLAVOR}"When you think about it, the proper place for a zombie is in the ground," says Grimrose. "So, really, I'm just expediting the process."
LocStringValues.GRIMROSE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 暗樱草可以把这条线上的两个特殊僵尸拖进地下.
LocStringValues.GRIMROSE_TOOLTIP: 将一个特殊僵尸拖进地下, 被强化时可以拖的更多
LocStringValues.GUACODILE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上

{FLAVOR}Ask Guacodile to tell you a little bit about himself and he'll give you a wry smile. "I'm a Guacodile. I've got a bite like a bear trap. Heck, I've been known to walk on water. I'm pretty much the whole enchilada." Yeah, the guy is a bit of a braggart but he's good at what he does.
LocStringValues.GUACODILE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: When attacked, Guacodiles will rush off the lawn, biting any zombies they encounter.
LocStringValues.GUACODILE_TOOLTIP: Will rush all zombies ahead of him when attacked
LocStringValues.HOLLYKNIGHT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}用法: {STAT}tap to arm, tap on target tile to fire
{KEYWORD}Knockback: {STAT}1 tile -- 3 tiles -- 1 tile
{KEYWORD}{STAT}Note: {STAT}Holly leaves cannot be revived with Intensive Carrot

{FLAVOR}Holly Barrier would like to advise folks not to eat his berries. "It's rude to eat somebody's berries without asking," he says. "In addition, they are highly toxic."
LocStringValues.HOLLYKNIGHT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Holly Barrier deals damage to zombies attacking him, and can launch 3 prickly barrier leaves to knock back and damage zombies.
LocStringValues.HOLLYKNIGHT_TOOLTIP: Damages attacking zombies and launches barriers
LocStringValues.HOLONUT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}can't protect plants planted after Infi-nut
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻

{FLAVOR}As a young nut he spent way too much time standing between two mirrors and trying to look into infinity.
LocStringValues.HOLONUT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 全息坚果可以保护前后两格的植物, 并随时间恢复血量.
LocStringValues.HOLONUT_TOOLTIP: 保护前后两格的植物, 随时间恢复血量
LocStringValues.HOMINGTHISTLE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}子弹最远飞行距离 (格): {STAT}5.6 -- 5.0 -- 4.4

{FLAVOR}Don't even think about trying to pull one over on Homing Thistle. He's got a bead on you. He sees right through your facade. It's like he has a laser beam ... aimed at your soul.
LocStringValues.HOMINGTHISTLE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Homing Thistles fire seeking shots at targets that are the closest to home.
LocStringValues.HOMINGTHISTLE_TOOLTIP: Attacks farthest left target in any lane
LocStringValues.HOTDATE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Hot Date's a charmer. He's polite, well-read, has lots of interesting opinions, and practices active listening. He's the life of every single party - you should have seen him dance! Girls line up around him to talk to him wherever he goes.
LocStringValues.HOTDATE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Hot Dates instantly attract nearby zombies from adjacent lanes to its lane.
LocStringValues.HOTDATE_TOOLTIP: Instantly attracts zombies to its lane
LocStringValues.HOTPOTATO_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}deals damage to passing zombies for 2.5s
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上

{FLAVOR}How does Hot Potato stay so positive and even-peeled all the time? Yoga, that's how. She never misses a class. Also, regular meditation. It's the only way she can handle the hard work of fighting zombies, day in and day out, without melting down.
LocStringValues.HOTPOTATO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Hot Potatoes melt the ice blocks and octopi they're planted on.
LocStringValues.HURRIKALE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}blows away most flying zombies in lane

{FLAVOR}You could say Hurrikale is a "blow hard" in the truest sense of the phrase. He is the first chair trombonist in the Biennial Philharmonic Orchestra. He is also proficient in the trumpet, saxophone and the tuba. But man o' man, you should really see him on the flugelhorn. Dude absolutely kills it.
LocStringValues.HURRIKALE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Hurrikales instantly push back all zombies in their lane with a chilling wind.
LocStringValues.HURRIKALE_TOOLTIP: Blows a chilling wind that pushes back zombies in lane
LocStringValues.HYPNOSHROOM_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Hypno-shroom has no trouble persuading zombies to fight on behalf of the plants. But he has yet to convince one to cluck like a chicken. "One day," he says. "One day."
LocStringValues.HYPNOSHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: When zombies eat Hypno-shrooms, they will turn around and fight for you.
LocStringValues.ICEAGE_LEVEL_NAME: 极寒冰窟 - 第 {LEVEL_NUMBER} 天
LocStringValues.ICEBURG_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}影响范围 (横x纵): {STAT}单体 -- 一格 -- 2x1

{FLAVOR}Don't get lost staring into Iceberg's adorably cute eyes. If you do, it will be your last step... but only if you're a zombie.
LocStringValues.ICEBURG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 冰冻生菜可以冰冻踩到它的僵尸.
LocStringValues.IMITATER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Having studied French Theater at Julienne, the Imitater went to the streets with his art, and has perfected his technique he calls "Potato stuck in a box."
LocStringValues.IMITATER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Imitaters let you use two of the same plant during a level!
LocStringValues.IMITATER_TOOLTIP: Lets you have two of the same plant
LocStringValues.INTENSIVECARROT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上

{FLAVOR}"How do I revive defeated plants?" asks Intensive Carrot. "In a word:  vitamins. Vitamins and sorcery."
LocStringValues.INTENSIVECARROT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 复活萝卜可以复活死掉的植物.
LocStringValues.JACKOLANTERN_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}用法: {STAT}点击一下以喷射火焰, 持续10秒
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻, 温暖周围的植物
{KEYWORD}{STAT}Note: {STAT}长按会快速熄火

{FLAVOR}"Boo! Mwah-ha-ha-haaaaah," opines Jack O' Lantern. Oh, yes. Things and stuff are scheduled to be seriously spooky when he's around. Count on it.
LocStringValues.JACKOLANTERN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 杰克南瓜灯向前方一段距离喷射火焰.
LocStringValues.JACKOLANTERN_TOOLTIP: 向前方一段距离喷射火焰
LocStringValues.JALAPENO_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}This jalapeno is one spicy character by day and The Macrame Vigilante by night. You might be wondering what his secret weapon is... it's knots.
LocStringValues.JALAPENO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 火爆辣椒燃烧整条线上的僵尸.
LocStringValues.KERNELPULT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}有50%概率投出定身僵尸4秒的黄油

{FLAVOR}While working as an usher at the local movieplex, he saw "Fried Green Tomatoes" and found his higher calling. He packed up his husks, his kernels, his butter, and enlisted.
LocStringValues.KERNELPULT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 玉米投手向僵尸投掷玉米粒和黄油.
LocStringValues.KIWIBEAST_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}knocks back zombies during growth

{FLAVOR}"I like to keep an even keel," says Kiwibeast. "But zombies... oooh... zombies make me so mad! And when I get mad... RARRRRRGGG!"
LocStringValues.KIWIBEAST_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Kiwibeasts emit damaging thumps, and become bigger and more powerful the more they are hurt by zombies.
LocStringValues.KIWIBEAST_TOOLTIP: Becomes more powerful as it takes damage
LocStringValues.LASER_BEAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}After a laser eye surgery had gone horribly right, Laser Bean gained a sense of purpose and a new-found affinity for competitive staring contests.
LocStringValues.LASER_BEAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 激光豆对前方整条线上的僵尸造成伤害.
LocStringValues.LAVAGUAVA_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}岩浆坑留存50秒, 每秒对上面的僵尸造成100伤害(平均)
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻, 温暖周围的植物

{FLAVOR}Lava Guava frowns with barely-repressed rage. He's trying to keep it in check. He's trying so hard. But one day some zombie's going to push him too far, and he can't be held responsible for the consequences.
LocStringValues.LAVAGUAVA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Lava Guavas erupt on contact, damaging nearby zombies and creating a burning lava pool in its tile that incinerates zombies.
LocStringValues.LAVAGUAVA_TOOLTIP: 喷发并留下岩浆坑伤害僵尸
LocStringValues.LEAVE_DANGER_ROOM_GAME: Do you want to return to the world map? Leaving will count as a loss and you will need to restart this level.
LocStringValues.LEAVE_GAME_BODY:
你确认要退出这一关卡吗?
这将会使你丢失目前的进度.
LocStringValues.LEVEL_OF_THE_DAY_NOT_ACCESSIBLE: You must complete Ancient Egypt - Day 5 before you can start the event.
LocStringValues.LIGHTNINGREED_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}This may come as a shock, but Lightning Reed has a serious passion for ham radio. His call sign is El3ctric H1ccup. You can tune in every Tuesday to hear him read the classics to elderly plants. This week: Seeds and Sensibility.
LocStringValues.LIGHTNINGREED_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 闪电芦苇向前方三条路最近的僵尸发射闪电, 闪电会在僵尸和障碍物间弹射.
LocStringValues.LIGHTNINGREED_TOOLTIP: Zaps several chickens or zombies per strike
LocStringValues.LILYPAD_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Not many people know this, but Lily Pad absolutely loves square dancing. There he is, a circular plant gliding across the dance floor making squares. He loves how it pushes his boundaries and really makes him think outside the sphere.
LocStringValues.LILYPAD_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 莲叶允许你在上面种植非水生植物.
LocStringValues.LILYPAD_TOOLTIP: 允许你在上面种植非水生植物
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ALMOST_02: {ZOMBIE} thinks you're scared! Show 'em you've got what it takes!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ALMOST_03: {ZOMBIE} wants a chance to eat yer brainz, come show 'em who's the boss!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_BIRTHDAY_1: Day 3 of Birthdayz Party is on! Play now and take a bite out of Birthday Cake Pharoah.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_BIRTHDAY_2: Play day 4 of the Birthdayz Party event right now for zombies jet-packed with presents!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_BIRTHDAY_3: Gargantuar has crashed today's Birthdayz Party. Play now to wrap him up!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_1: Feastivus Day 2 is on! Do I hear reindeer on the lawn? Play now!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_10: It's beginning to look a lot like the end of Feastivus. Only a few days left. Play now!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_11: It's the final day of Feastivus! Fa-la-la-la-last chance!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_2: Get double Snowballs when you win a power up in Feastivus. Snowball fight is on!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_3: Win Snow Pea's winter hat collection. Keep your brains warm. Feastivus is on!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_4: Try out Sap-fling in Feastivus today. Stickier than fruitcake! Play now.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_5: Win 5 in a row and get 特点 Feastivus rewards from Senor Pinata. He loves a good holiday bash!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_6: Day 11 of Feastivus is on. The Imps have been hung by the Gargantuars with care. Don't miss out!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_7: Sap-fling is back for Day 12 of Feastivus. Pinecones, away!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_8: Play Feastivus and start off the New Year with a fresh brain!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_FEASTIVUS_2014_9: Feastivus is on! The holidays haven't stopped, and neither has Gargantuar in his ugly sweater. Play now.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_01: 24-hour zombie sneak attack! Battle zombies from all worlds in a 特点 level for big prizes!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_02: 24-hour zombie party level is live! Complete {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} parties in a row and win bigger prizes.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_03: Pinata Party is now live! Frantic 僵尸 Mayhem from all worlds at once. Play now!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_04: It's Pinata Party Time. Complete {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} parties in a row and meet Senor Pinata!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_05: It's 24 hours of 僵尸 Party Time! Your next Pinata Party is ready. Play now!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_06: The latest Pinata Party is closing soon! Finish now to beat Senor Pinata.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_07: Just one more Pinata Party to get the {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL}-streak Senor Pinata! Ending soon.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_GOLIVE_08: Hey, Pinata Party animal! Hurry on over for a shot at Senor Pinata. Ends soon.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_PARTY_ANIMAL: Pinata Party animal! Play now for a shot at Senor Pinata.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_PARTY_TIME: It's Pinata Party time. Win {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} in a row to meet Senor Pinata!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_PLAY_TODAY: Play today's Pinata Party to win big tomorrow!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_TODAY: Today's Pinata Party is on! Whack some zombies now.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_WIN_5: Win {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} Pinata Parties in a row for big prizes!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_WIN_PRIZES: Win PRIZES in a 24-hour battle with zombies from all worlds!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_LOD_WIN_TODAY: Win today's Pinata Party for {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} in a row!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_DANGER_ROOM_01: You have a personal best of Level {LEVEL_NUMBER} in {DANGER_ROOM_NAME}. Think you can do it again?
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_DANGER_ROOM_02: You reached Level {LEVEL_NUMBER} in the {DANGER_ROOM_NAME}. The 僵尸ay you can't go higher. Prove 'em wrong.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_DANGER_ROOM_03: You're so close to your personal best of Level {LEVEL_NUMBER} in {DANGER_ROOM_NAME}. Can you make it?
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_DANGER_ROOM_04: The 僵尸ay you can't pass Level {LEVEL_NUMBER} in {DANGER_ROOM_NAME}. Silly 僵尸. Go for it.

LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_JOUST_EVENT_SOON_REFRESH: The current tournament ends tomorrow! Last chance to compete!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_JOUST_FREE_PLAY_REFRESH: You have another Free Play in Battlez mode!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_NEXT_PINATA_HUNT_REFRESH: Your pinatas have refreshed! Replay levels to win World pinatas!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_QUEST_MAINLINE: Travel Log Update: Onward to {WORLD}! {QUEST_TITLE} to earn {XP_GRANTED} points.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_QUEST_METERED: Travel Log Update: You've defeated {DEFEATED_COUNT} brain-hungry zombies! Only {DEFEATS_NEEDED} left to complete the Quest.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_QUEST_NEAR_LEVELING: Travel Log Update: You're almost there! Earn {XP_NEEDED} points and level up to Rank {NEXT_RANK}.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_VASEBREAKER_6D_01: Play Vasebreaker today! Those vases won't smash themselves.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_VASEBREAKER_ENDLESS_CONTINUE: You're smashing it up in Vasebreaker! Play now to break your all-time zombie-wave record.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_VASEBREAKER_ENDLESS_TRYAGAIN: Take another go at Vasebreaker! Stand up. Dust off your plants. The zombies are waiting.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_VASEBREAKER_UNLOCK_BUTTERZOMB: Unlock the Butterizer! Defeat three Vasebreaker levels and all the butter is yours.
Take on the Vasebreaker again to unlock the mighty Butterizer!
Don't stop Vasebreaking now! One more level and Butterizer and its mighty butter are yours!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_VASEBREAKER_UNLOCK_MOVEVASE: The zombies are coming in Vasebreaker! Defeat {ENDLESS_WAVE} waves to take control with the Vase Displacer!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_VASEBREAKER_UNLOCK_REVEALVASE: See hidden zombies. Finish the Vasebreaker tutorial now and get X-Ray power!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_EMPTY_POT_1D_01: You have sprouts waiting in your Zen Garden. Plant them quick and add more coins to your game.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_EMPTY_POT_3D_01: You have unplanted sprouts in your Zen Garden. Grow 'em up right to give yourself more coins.

LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_ALL_1D_02: Your plants have grown! Visit your Zen Garden to collect heaps of coins.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_ALL_1D_03: Your plants have grown! Visit your Zen Garden to collect heaps of coins.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_ALL_3D_01: It's getting dry in your Zen Garden. Water your plants now to get more BOOM in your wallet.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_ALL_3D_02: Water your Zen Garden now and get cool gifts. Don't let your happy plants go dry.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_ALL_3D_03: Your plants have grown! Collect your coins in Zen Garden!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_ALL_BOOST_1D_: Your plants are sporting nicely! Visit Zen Garden to collect coins.
The plants in your Zen Garden have grown!

You have coins waiting to be collected! Visit Zen Garden for some sweet cash.

LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_SINGLE_02: Your {PLANT} has grown! Water it again for an extra-big payout.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_SINGLE_03: Your {PLANT} has grown! Water it again for an extra-big payout.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_SINGLE_BOOST_: Your {PLANT} has grown to full size! Visit Zen Garden to pick up your super plant powers.
Your Marigold is fully grown! Visit your Zen Garden for an extra-big payout.
Your Marigold just kicked out some serious coin!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_NOTE_ZEN_PLANT_READY_SINGLE_MARIGO: Your Marigold has grown! Water it again for an extra-big payout.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT: What's in Treasure Yeti's lunchbox? Defeat him to find out!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_01: What's in Treasure Yeti's lunchbox? Defeat him to find out!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_02: Treasure Yeti won't give up without a fight. So fight him!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_03: Sometimes Treasure Yeti sneaks up on you. Like right now!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_04: Treasure Yeti is loose! Defeat him now to win his riches.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_05: Fight for the awesome things in Treasure Yeti's lunchbox.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_06: Defeat the Treasure Yeti now to get what's in his lunchbox.
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_07: Eat the Treasure Yeti's delicious lunch... of treasure!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_08: The Treasure Yeti thinks you're weak. Prove him wrong!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_09: Defeat the Treasure Yeti and take his lunchbox. Do it now!
LocStringValues.LOCAL_PUSH_YETI_EVENT_10: There's only one way to get Treasure Yeti's riches. Fight!
LocStringValues.LOD_NEXT_TIME_SUBHEADER: Take some whacks at SENOR PINATA by playing {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} consecutive parties.
LocStringValues.LOD_NEXT_TIME_SUBHEADER_DAYS: Play {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} days in a row to earn a Grand Prize!!
LocStringValues.LOD_NEXT_TIME_SUBHEADER_HEROES: Take some whacks at the Hero-Tron 5000 by playing 5 consecutive parties.
LocStringValues.LOD_NEXT_TIME_SUBHEADER_HOLIDAY: Get a giant present by playing {LARGE_PINATA_INTERVAL} consecutive parties.
LocStringValues.LOD_OPEN_BIG_REWARD_SUBHEADER: Whack SENOR PINATA x3 times to open the Mystery Treasure!
LocStringValues.LOD_OPEN_BIG_REWARD_SUBHEADER_HEROES: Whack the Hero-Tron 5000 to open the Mystery Treasure!
LocStringValues.LOD_OPEN_BIG_REWARD_SUBHEADER_HOLIDAY: Tap the giant present 3 times to open the Mystery Treasure!
LocStringValues.LOD_OPEN_BIG_REWARD_SUBHEADER_SUMMERNIGH: Tap the fireworks box 3 times to open the Mystery Treasure!
LocStringValues.LOD_OPEN_REWARDS_BIRTHDAYZ_FOOTER: Double coin rewards with every win!
LocStringValues.LOD_OPEN_REWARDS_FOOTER_SUMMERNIGHTS: Summer Nights - Loads of coins with every win!
LocStringValues.LOD_OPEN_REWARDS_SUBHEADER: TAP to open and find out what treasure lies inside.
LocStringValues.LOSTCITY_LEVEL_NAME: 失落之城 - 第 {LEVEL_NUMBER} 天
LocStringValues.LOW_DISK_SPACE_WARNING: Your device is low on disk space. Your progress may not be saved.
LocStringValues.MAGNETSHROOM_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Despite his unusual appearance, Magnet-shroom doesn't have a problem attracting girlfriends. But he does have a problem keeping them. It's the same thing every time. In the end, they always find him too clingy.
LocStringValues.MAGNETSHROOM_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Magnet-shrooms remove helmets and other metal objects from zombies around them.
LocStringValues.MAGNETSHROOM_TOOLTIP: Removes helmets and other metal objects from zombies
LocStringValues.MAGNIFYINGGRASS_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}用法: {STAT}tap to spend sun for an attack

{FLAVOR}Magnifying Grass understands the inherent power of a rainbow. Beneath her stoic features she takes great joy in delivering radiant multicolored destruction to the zombie horde.
LocStringValues.MAGNIFYINGGRASS_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Magnifying Grass turns sun into a bolt of colorful damage.
LocStringValues.MAGNIFYINGGRASS_TOOLTIP: Uses sun to shoot out concentrated light
LocStringValues.MAINMENU_DELETE_PROFILE_BODY: If you DELETE this profile you will lose all game play data associated with this profile including any purchased coins.
LocStringValues.MARIGOLD_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Marigold has dedicated herself to the Zen lifestyle. She's a team player, and gives it her best there in the garden. But if she never has to confront another zombie on the lawn again it will be too soon.
LocStringValues.MARIGOLD_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marigolds give you coin rewards in Zen Garden.
LocStringValues.MARIGOLD_TOOLTIP: Gives you rewards in Zen Garden
LocStringValues.MELONPULT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"Everyone says my head looks like a melon," said the middle child of the Pult family, "and they would be right." Don't ask him if he's seedless or not though, it offends him and frankly it's none of your business.
LocStringValues.MELONPULT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Melon-pults do heavy damage to groups of zombies.
LocStringValues.MELONPULT_TOOLTIP: Does heavy damage to groups of zombies
LocStringValues.MINECART_TUTORIAL_1: Drag the mine cart to a new location
LocStringValues.MINECART_TUTORIAL_2: Great work! You can plant on empty mine carts
LocStringValues.MISSILETOE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}用法: {STAT}tap to arm, tap on target tile to fire
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻

{FLAVOR}Other plants often make fun of her, because she doesn't really have any toes despite her name being "Missile Toe". THAT makes her a bit mad... so she took vengeance, in her own way - by hanging herself up as an ornament right above the door during last year's Christmas party. After mortifying several couples and a zombie, she was sure that others wouldn't mess with her again.
LocStringValues.MISSILETOE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Missile Toes launch cold blasts at any tile on the lawn. They deal damage to zombies on the impact tile & can freeze/chill in a 3x3 area.
LocStringValues.MODERN_LEVEL_NAME: 现代年华 - 第 {LEVEL_NUMBER} 天
LocStringValues.MOONFLOWER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}生产量: {STAT}emits 50 sun as well as additional 25 sun for each adjacent Moonflower
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can't be eaten
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫冰冻

{FLAVOR}Moonflower is a fierce collaborator. She'll collaborate with anything. She'd collaborate with a table if she could.
LocStringValues.MOONFLOWER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Moonflowers radiate a glow that powers up adjacent Shadow plants.
LocStringValues.MOONFLOWER_TOOLTIP: Gives sun and powers up adjacent shadow plants
LocStringValues.MULTIPLE_QUEST_ROLLUP_AWARD_DESCRIPTION: You've completed a pile of quests! Have a pile of rewards!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_1000300: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}{LONG}Those peashooters are confused and are just going to be in the way.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_1000301: {EXCITED}{LONG}Use the shovel to dig them up and make room for useful plants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ALMANAC_FIND_MORE_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Listen carefully. The next part is important.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ALMANAC_FIND_MORE_2: {SAY}Tiers are like alternate versions for plants. Some stats will be better, while some stats will be worse.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ALMANAC_FIND_MORE_3: {SAY}Plant tiers can have a great impact on your strategies. Think wisely before choosing the plant tiers.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ALMANAC_FIND_MORE_4: {SAY}You need to buy Tier 2 and Tier 3 once before you can go back to Tier 1.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ALMANAC_FIND_MORE_5: {SAY}After that, you can switch the tier of a plant to whatever you want.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ALMANAC_FIND_MORE_7: {SAY}Now, tap 'Find More' to end this tutorial.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ALMANAC_INTRO_2: {EXCITED}A place where you can read about plants and zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ALMANAC_UPGRADE_PEASHOOTER_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{SAY}Bring your Peashooter to the next tier!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH1_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}It's got everything a growing plant needs!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Caution, User Dave. My sensors indicate there are zombies on your beach...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH1_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}... and far too much water. It will overwhelm the plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH1_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}We still have some land left here... maybe we can work with that?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}User Dave, data suggests that we should beware the tides.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH2_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}When the tide comes in, it'll be a WIPE OUT for our plant friends?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH2_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. But the tide line indicates how high the water will rise. Plan accordingly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH2_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}No problem-o! We'll just lay down some Lily Pads.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH2_INTRO_5: {EXCITED:crazydave}Then the other plants can ride the waves!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH2_INTRO_6: {PLAYFUL:winnie}Or as the vernacular of this era goes: They can "hang ten."
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH2_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}...There may be zombies lurking underneath, though. Stay sharp.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}Dudes, like, you're totally in for it now!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH6_INTRO_2: {SAY}The Deep Sea Gargantuars have their slimy sights on you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH6_INTRO_4: {SAY}But you can't escape their scaly grip!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH6_INTRO_7: {TIRED:winnie}He is also quite unpleasant, User Dave. Quite unpleasant.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH9_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}These zombies won't back down until you have proven your worth.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH9_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}You'll need to kill them quick enough to dissuade them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH9_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Sounds like it's gonna be a crowded beach party!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH9_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}... full of zombie corpses of course.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH10_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}The zombies lurking below it may be a problem.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH10_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Forget the ones underneath, we have other zombies coming close as well!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH10_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}This will be a huge and problematic attack.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Take that, crazy beach! You can't drag us down!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH10_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I'm also ready to travel to another era.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH11_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}I know, but hear me out... this is technically our lawn ages ago, right?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH11_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}How did it transform this much anyway?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH11_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}Boats and castles and cowboys and now... this!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH11_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}... actually. Yeah. I question that sometimes too.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH11_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}And I say time shenanigans are the only acceptable answers for now.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH11_INTRO_10: {SAY:winnie}We'll have to come back to this later. For now, zombies bashing.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH13_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Do you think that the plants will finally use my mini surfboards?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH13_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Unlikely. It's not a practical choice compared to Lily Pad.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH13_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}But think of the implications... fighting zombies AND being rad at the same time!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH13_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}We simply can't catch up with their speed normally.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH13_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}That's why we need Lily Pads - only a stable defense will do.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH15_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Dude! The beach's too rough for ya?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH15_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}For I make my mystery barrels rise up!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH15_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}What do they contain? A nasty surprise! Signed, Doc Zomboss
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH15_INTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:crazydave}I'm more surprised he's not pulling the evil laugh as a bad guy.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH15_INTRO_6: {TIRED:winnie}He means business. And so do we.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH18_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Hey there neighbor! We're playing a game today!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH18_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}A game of darts, to be precise.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH18_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Yes! Except that instead of darts, we are using holly leaves!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH18_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}... prepared by Penny of course. I'm still banned from picking plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH18_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}And instead of the board, it's the lawn.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH18_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}And instead of the score zones, it's the zombies!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH18_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}Now throw them leaves, and score me some zombies!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH20_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Yo beach bums! You've been around my beach long enough.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH20_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}The last thing you'll see is my blinding victory, dude! Later! Signed, Doc Zomboss
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH20_INTRO_4: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}Something tells me we're having a close encounter with the slimy kind.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH20_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}Ugh. I think I got a tentacle stuck in my system.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH20_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Let's hope that I don't traumatize myself during the process.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH20_OUTRO_5: {EXCITED:crazydave}Back to the world of dinosaurs, then?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH20_OUTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave. Or... what's left of it, after that meteor.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH20_OUTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}I hope they are ok! I DO want one as a pet, after all!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Alert! I've detected a strange statue of surfing-era significance.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}Well lookie there! It's a tiki statue. With crazy eyes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_3: {SAY:winnie}Analysis indicates this tiki could inflict a terrifying challenge upon any who follow it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}So you're saying that a tiki torture awaits? Get it? A tiki TORCH-er?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_5:
{TIRED:winnie}User Dave, I must say, your pun is...
TORCH-er-ous.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED:crazydaveicon}Look! It must be time to play Beach 僵尸 Bungo!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEACH_ZOMBIENOTE_3: {SAY:crazydaveicon}You already won, Penny? Wow. You're good at this!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEGHOULED_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I am picking up a grid of plants, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEGHOULED_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}My scans suggest that they can be swapped to create matches of three.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEGHOULED_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}I saw a game like that once on my telephoney!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BEGHOULED_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}You can use sun to upgrade the plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUY_PLANTFOOD_3: {特点4}Here neighbor, have some moola! Why? Because I'm CRAAAZY!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUY_POWERUPS_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED}{LONG}If you want to use a Power Up, you can buy one with coins!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_BUY_POWERUPS_2: {LONG}Just tap on that doohickey down there and you're in business!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Yes, User Dave. The town looks even more desolated now.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}That will not stop the zombies from invading this place.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT1_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Day or night, we're always ready to swat them away!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT3_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Why do we have to deal with these micro managing challenges?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT3_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Zomboss's influence has spreaded far and wide... Maybe he set this up?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT3_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}There may be another force at work as well, presumably?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT5_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}I hope not. Those look quite nice for a ride!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT5_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}I doubt a robot build is better than an actual bull, but, your opinion I guess.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT6_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}特点 traps have been equipped on the rails for the zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT6_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}You're required to submit your brain to us; otherwise, your plants will suffer a blasting defeat.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT6_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}Finally! A gun slinging duel! Now where's my horse?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT8_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}A new plant has been found in this old town, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT8_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Any plant is always welcomed as a new friend! So what does this little guy do?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT8_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}He will aim at only a specific spot 5 tiles ahead of him.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT8_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Splendid! I'm sure we'll have a lot of fun with him!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT8_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}But just in case, I'll also send more small friends to support him!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT8_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}After all, small people have to stick together right?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT8_INTRO_7: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}If only he could be this profound and sane all the time...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT10_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}More agents have arrived in the persuit of making you perish.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT10_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}The Rangers will dispatch you, and your brain will be ours.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT10_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}Ah, well. Our young and talented plants will fight back just as strong!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT10_OUTRO_1: {START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The town can rest easy for now.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Finally! Must be tiring for every one. It's 3 AM already!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT10_OUTRO_3: {EXCITED:winnie}When you're out time travelling, such concept doesn't matter anymore.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_NIGHT10_OUTRO_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}You're right Penny! Though it's definitely time we hit the timestream.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY1_INTRO_5:
{SAY}Chance of beating Zomboss once and for all:
0.015%
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY4_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}According to my data, zombies here are really fond of dancing.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY4_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Be on the lookout for when they suddenly do so.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY4_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}You can't join it, if you're wondering.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY4_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Aw. I've always wanted to know what it feels like to dance with the zombies. Might be fun!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY5_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Agents are arriving to mark your brains as my property.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY5_INTRO_4: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I don't want my brains all marked up.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY8_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Another flower line! And a herd of stampeding bulls!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY8_INTRO_2: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Time to giddy up... and tame those robot animals!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Who could have possibly placed those endangered plants over there???
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY9_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Still! Is it a trick from Zomboss?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY9_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Then we will simply have to outsmart him and his zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY10_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}User Dave, it's time to saddle up and leave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY10_OUTRO_3: {EXCITED:winnie}Where do you think the future will take us?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY10_OUTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}We should take another look at my Time-Space Map.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I say, Penny, old thing, tally ho! Pip-pip and such!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY11_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie} We are in the Wild West, User Dave. Not Victorian England.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY11_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}We are likely to encounter far more ferocious former frontiersmen, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY11_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}We will need to sharpen our skills to stake any claim.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY12_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The West is full of animals, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY12_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Not just bulls... chickens have also joined the battle!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY12_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}They may come randomly at any time as a form of ambushes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY12_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}They are also too low to be shot by most straight-shooters.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY12_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Yikes! They are pecking good! We'll need to bring specific plants, then!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY12_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}Do you think that their meat is good, though?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY12_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}Improbable. They are still zombies after all.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY14_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Welcome to the barn, where all the chickens and bulls are kept.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY14_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Your confidence will not save you from a pecking doom this time!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY14_INTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Hey! Ain't no pet gonna peck my face today!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY14_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}I'll have a lot of fried chickens after this, though!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY15_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Why aren't there any zombies themed after trains?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY15_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}I want a good train raid just as much as a shoot-out too!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY15_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}I don't know, User Dave. We can never guess anything when it comes to Zomboss.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY15_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}But although we don't have train raids, we DO have a lot of rails and carts this time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY15_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}Good enough for me! Carts are just small-sized trains anyway!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY15_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}Your logic confuses me as always, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY18_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Zomboss lied last time. THIS is the true farmhouse.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY18_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Be prepared for a MASSIVE pet swarm.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY18_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}I still advise you against eating them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY18_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}But Penny! I'm hungry! We have been time travelling for ages!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY18_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}No. I don't want you to become a zombie.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY20_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The final stand is near, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY20_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}The whole country club is against us.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY20_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Getting past them will be no easy task.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY20_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Our spirit's strong though! We can make it!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY20_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}But theirs are also burning with hunger. We'll see then.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY20_OUTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}So... I take it that we have to go back to another era to search for him?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}My Uncle Milo used to have one these, he called it a boom box.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {SAY:winnie}Actually, that's close enough. I'll allow it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_WORLDMAP_INTRO_4: {PLAYFUL}Let's get these plants to the watering hole.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_COWBOY_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}It appears brains are outlawed around here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTROWRAPUP_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}Nice pick, let's see how far you can get!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_BEACH_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Hi neighbor! Welcome to The Tiki Torch-er!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_BEACH_2: {SAY:crazydave}But beware! 僵尸are selling seashells by this seashore!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_BEACH_3: {SHOUT:crazydave}And they insist you pay in brains!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_COWBOY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Hi neighbor! Welcome to the Big Bad Butte!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_COWBOY_2: {SAY}And by big I mean crawling with zombies...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_DARK_2: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Here you'll find that day is night and knights are zombies!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_DARK_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Warning! I've detected carafes containing chemical compounds of a malevolent makeup!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_DARK_4: {TIRED:crazydave}Can you translate that into Crazy Dave Talk for me?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_DARK_5: {TIRED:winnie}There may be evil potions on the lawn, appearing once in a while!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_DARK_6: {EXCITED:crazydave}Evil medieval potions! They're the most dangerous kind...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_DARK_7: {EXCITED:crazydave}On account of having twice the evil!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DANGER_ROOM_INTRO_DINO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}Howdy, neighbor! Welcome to La Brainsa Tarpits!
