LocStringValues.WORLDMAP_EVENT_YETI_DESC: Hunt him down and collect sweet loot!
LocStringValues.WORLDMAP_YETI_EVENT_ALERT_DESCRIPTION: A Treasure Yeti has spawned in this level. Destroy him and get treasure before he vanishes!
LocStringValues.WORLDMAP_YETI_OTHER_WORLD_ALERT_DESCRIPT: A Treasure Yeti has spawned in this world. Destroy him and get treasure before he vanishes!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_BEACH: Take a trip back to the '60s and hang ten on the ocean waves! Tides are changing and those gnarly zombies make it not-so-safe to go back in the water!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_COWBOY: Head down the dusty trail for a showdown with the outlaw zombies of yesteryear! Gather up your plants for the big Brain Rush of 1850!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_DARK: Bring out your undead to the year 948! Harvest mushrooms in the dark of knight and get medieval on zombies from the days of yore!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_DINO: The ground thunders under the awful feet of terrible lizards! Dinosaurs prowl the past, provoking prehistoric zombies into a frenzy of ancient antipathy!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_EIGHTIES: Stock up on hairspray and rewind to the 1980s! With synthesized music and voraciously radical zombies, this heinous dance party will, like, totally tax you to the MAX!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_FUTURE: In the year 2323, the zombies will have brain extraction down to a science! Can the plants of the future save you from the undead of tomorrow?
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_ICEAGE: Explore the frozen wastes of prehistory and chill out with the coolest zombies ever. Beware the winds or your plants will be frozen veggies.
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_LOSTCITY: Discover the vanished city of gold, where sun is plentiful and misplaced zombies abound! Use 特点 tiles for extra sun, for these treasure-seekers are no idol threat!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_MODERN: The end is the beginning! Return to moments before you left in a contemporary contest stocked with zombies of every egregious era, as you face them all in a huge minigame bash!
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_COMMUNITY: The home of many great battles, designed and handcrafted by the community themselves! Battle against the wits of other players - can you come out on top?
LocStringValues.WORLD_PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION_PIRATE: The year is 1679, the golden age of zombie piracy! Keep your booty close and your plants closer as zombies take to the seas to plunder your brains!
LocStringValues.XSHOT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}可以种在水上

{FLAVOR}Sometimes Rotobaga hears the other plants gossiping about each other. "Did you notice that so-and-so has been putting on weight?" they might say. Or, "I hear that so-and-so is dating so-and-so. Can you believe it?"  But Rotobaga isn't the kind of plant to engage in idle gossip. She's not interested in talking about anyone behind their leaves. She does her best to just rise above it.
LocStringValues.XSHOT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 旋转芜菁沿对角线方向发动攻击.
LocStringValues.XSHOT_TOOLTIP: 沿对角线方向发动攻击
LocStringValues.YETI_FUE_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: When a yeti appears on the map, go after him quickly! If you can spot and defeat him in the level, he'll drop fabulous prizes!
LocStringValues.ZENGARDEN_USE_BOOST_BODY: Gets instant Plant Food effect when planted on the lawn.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_BEE_TUTORIAL_USE_BEE: Tap a plant. The bee will speed it up!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_BUY_SLOT_DIALOG_BODY: Opens up another pot to plant sprouts and earn sweet loot and boosts!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_DESTROY_BOOST_DIALOG_BODY: Are you sure you want to shovel this plant?  It will lose its boost.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_COLLECT_COINS: Here's some coins while you work towards a boost!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_RETURN_REMINDE: Return to Zen Garden often to boost your plants!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_USE_BOOST: Sunflower is now boosted! The boost lasts for one level.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_INTRO_TUTORIAL_WATER_PLANT_FO: She's ready for water. Keep her growing to get a boost!
It's a Sunflower! She's thirsty for water.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_COLLECT_COI: Marigold's growing up! And she has coins for you.
A batch of coins and she's done!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_PLACE_SPROU: You may plant another sprout now!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_RETURN_REMI: Return to Zen Garden often to earn coins!
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MARIGOLD_TUTORIAL_WATER_PLANT: It's a Marigold! She needs water.
The Marigold is ready for water.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_MULTIPLANT_TEXT: You may plant multiple sprouts to add a bonus to your chance to get an uncommon or rare plant.
LocStringValues.ZEN_GARDEN_WORTH_NO_SPROUTS: The bee will take your plant, but it hasn't grown enough to be worth any sprouts.  Sell anyway?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BARRELROLLER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}imps thrown from barrel when destroyed
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}Jalapeno can destroy both the Imps and the barrel

{FLAVOR}Barrel Roller 僵尸 is part of a super underground secret awesome club. You probably haven't heard of it. Also, his left arm is slightly longer than his right arm.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BARRELROLLER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His rolling barrel crushes plants and provides excellent protection.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Go to the beach, they said. Put a cone on your head, they said. So, yeah, that's what Pompadour Conehead did. He's at his best when following simple instructions.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His starfish cone gives him thrice the toughness of a normal pompadour zombie.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pompadour Buckethead tried to learn to play the ukulele. He figured it would be easier to learn than the guitar on account of how small it is. But his stiff fingers ... they just weren't made for it. Now he just bangs on his bucket. And he's not half-bad either.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His scallop shelled bucket gives him great resistance to damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pompadour 僵尸 recently noticed that he was wearing only one flip-flop. He THINKS he lost the other one while doing the limbo at a bonfire party the other night. But to be honest, that entire night is a little hazy ... and that flip-flop could be anywhere.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}See that starfish on Bikini Conehead's cone? She put that there herself. She gets a lot of compliments on it too. And sure enough, now it seems like everyone is accessorizing with starfish. She's a trendsetter, that one.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Her starfish cone makes her thrice as tough as a basic bikini zombie.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Bikini Buckethead had big ambitions. She wanted to do more than just lurch around on a beach all day. Her life's dream: to perform internationally with a synchronized swimming team. Sadly, the nose plug was her undoing. If she only had a nose ...
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Her scallop shelled bucket provides great protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FEM_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Is it weird that we haven't seen any female zombies before? Some say yes. Some say no. Either way, Bikini 僵尸 is used to breaking new ground. She's not afraid to go where no woman zombie has gone before. You could call her a pioneer. You could call her a hero.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FISHERMAN_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}plants next to him are tossed off the lawn

{FLAVOR}Everyone is tired of Fisherman 僵尸's fishing stories. He's always bragging about the size of his catch. Time and time again, he claims to have caught "the big one." But the fact of the matter is, no one has seen him actually catch a fish. Not once. It's more than a little suspicious.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FISHERMAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Casts his line to pull far plants to him.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Talk about a disgruntled zombie. Beach Flag 僵尸 is fed up. None of the other zombies seem to appreciate just how difficult it is for him to swim while holding a flag. Not once have they thanked him for doing the hard work that needs to be done. So it shouldn't come as a surprise: He's been interviewing for jobs elsewhere.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge wet "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}crushes plants with driftwood
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}launches Imp Mermaid when damaged

{FLAVOR}This big guy loves the water. When he's deep down in it, he feels light as a feather. He feels like he's flying. Most importantly, during those precious moments, he feels as if the weight of Imp Mermaid 僵尸 has been lifted from his shoulders.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Titanic zombie who isn't shellfish with his might.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Imp Mermaid 僵尸 couldn't decide whether to wear the top made out of coconut shells or the top made out of seashells. She went with the slinky coconut-shell number because, really, the seashells are soooo last wave.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Washes in past your defenses, then flounders forward.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_OCTOPUS_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}It started innocently enough. One day, Octo 僵尸 decided to get a pet octopus. But he loved that octopus so much, he got another and another ... and another. Next thing you know, he was volunteering at an octopus rescue shelter. And now, well, no one wants to tell him, but he's pretty much the undersea equivalent of a cat lady. You should see how many are living at his house. It's quite startling.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_OCTOPUS_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Throws octopi at your plants to bind them up. Bound plants are passive until their octopus is destroyed.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_SNORKEL_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Snorkel 僵尸 has a hard time getting the Bikini 僵尸. He's tried offering them flowers, jewelry, and even chocolate-covered brains. But nothing seems to work. They just can't seem to see past the snorkel on his face.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_SNORKEL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Snorkel zombies can submerges underwater to avoid most attacks.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_SURFER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can crush a plant with his board

{FLAVOR}Surfer 僵尸 took up surfing just last year. At first, he only did it because he thought it would make him look cool. But he was a natural. Now he can hang 10 with the best of them. Now he's headed to the pro circuit. Now he IS cool.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEACH_SURFER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Surfs past plants on the water, then carries board on land.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEGHOULED_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Side effects of the tablet include: Can't touch brainz, can't take a shower (not that he needs one) and hallucinating his distant cousins from Ancient Egypt. Man, this is one hell of a strong tablet he stole from Wizard 僵尸.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BEGHOULED_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His magical tablet provides protection as well as magic that helps him avoid eating plants.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BIRTHDAY_PHARAOH_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can withstand Cherry Bombs and other instants
{KEYWORD}Speed Details: {STAT}her speed increases once she's free

{FLAVOR}The cage? She got caught once by an aquarium due to being mistaken for a mermaid. She ate the owner then broke out of there on her own - caged and all. The coral? She stumbled onto a reef on her way back. The octopus? She got inspired by her favorite comic character. Psst... tell no one it's a cosplay prop.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BIRTHDAY_PHARAOH_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Her toughened metal cage makes her VERY resistant to damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_ALMANAC_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Each Camel 僵尸 is an excellent ballroom dancer, practicing every day by holding up mysterious signs with strange symbols. They call it "The Camel Dance."
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_ALMANAC_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Arrives in step with other Camel 僵尸in a group of three zombies or more.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_MANYHUMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Leader of the many hump camel group.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_ONEHUMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Leader of the one hump camel group.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_SEGMENT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Just another camel in the group.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CAMEL_TWOHUMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Leader of the two hump camel group.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CANNON_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The Imps joined the Order of the Cannon Fraternity, Kappa Pea, and quickly rose through the ranks due to the constant firing of their leadership.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CANNON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Shoots Pirate Imps to mid-lawn. Eventually it can explode and rain down imps if not destroyed quickly.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CHICKEN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Once released onto the lawn chickens run full speed to peck at your brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CHICKEN_FARMER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}After publishing the fourth study on Ornithology, and four years of research at the Hadron Collider, Chicken Wrangler 僵尸 has finally solved the riddle of what came first.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CHICKEN_FARMER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Releases a flock of chickens once his baling wire is broken.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The sheriff of these here parts. Please pull over the horse and pull out your driver's license, registration, and proof of brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His cowhide cone gives him thrice the toughness of a regular cowboy.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}A five-time winner of the temporal chili cook-off. Those Egyptian zombies don't know their chili, but Cowboys love their beans. The more you eat, the more you brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His chili pot hat makes him greatly resistant to damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cart-Head 僵尸 could probably move a lot faster if he did a handstand and rolled, but he's not thinking that far ahead.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Cart-head 僵尸's cart-shaped chapeau provides extra-wheeled head protection.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cowboy 僵尸 thinks he's the roughest, toughest, meanest zombie varmint in the west, south and east. He's anxious to test his skills in the central coast region.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge dusty "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Arrows point to the brain on Cowboy Rally's Flag, as if to say, "Hey, everyone, I would like to emphasize this image." It's canny design.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_H: Cowboy Rally 僵尸 marks the appearance of a sizable stampede of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_COWBOY_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}crushes plants with brand
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}launches Bull Rider when damaged

{FLAVOR}Likes candy.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Conehead Peasant is just happy to have a cone over his head. Times are tough, man. He knows a lot of zombies don't even have that.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His stony turret cone makes him thrice as tough as normal peasants.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}None of the other zombies seem to understand just how versatile Buckethead Peasant's choice of headwear is. Sure, his bucket makes for a great battle helmet. But just last night, he cooked a truly divine brain stew in it. And next time you see his band, check out what he's using for a kick drum.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His forged bucket provides great protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Knight 僵尸 was just as surprised as anyone when 僵尸 King promoted him. He'd never say this out loud, but he's not sure he deserves the position. He's not sure he has what it takes to wear the armor. But like they say, "Fake it 'til you make it."
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His king appointed helm provides amazing protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Someone shouted, "Bring out your undead!" And then Peasant 僵尸 found himself here. He simply doesn't remember anything that happened before that.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}They keep telling Peasant 僵尸 that there is no greater reward than being granted the banner to carry into battle. But when he sees other Peasant 僵尸being granted cones, buckets, and even helms, he thinks maybe they're making that up so they don't hurt his feelings.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge dark "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}crushes plants with hammer
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}launches Imp Monk when damaged

{FLAVOR}When Dark Ages Gargantuar wants to find pantaloons that fit him, he has to shop at the "Enormous & Towering" store. He hates it though. It's embarrassing. He just wants to shop for clothes where all the other zombies shop.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Immense zombie who brings the hammer down.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Frankly, Imp Monk 僵尸 decided to don the robes because of the sweet haircut that went with them.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Summoned past most of your defenses, then shambles onward.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_IMP_DRAGON_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Imp 僵尸 knows he's too old to wear a dragon costume like a kid on Halloween. But he doesn't care. Let the others judge. His spirit animal is a dragon, and he feels closer to his true self when he's dressed like this.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_IMP_DRAGON_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Claws forward like a normal zombie, but is immune to fire damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_JUGGLER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Oh sure, everyone loves to laugh at Jester 僵尸's clownish routines. But what no one knows is that he has a Master of Fine Arts from the Chewliard Performing Arts School. Heck, he's been on stage with some of the finest classical theatre companies this side of the lawn. But sometimes you just gotta go where the paycheck is.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_JUGGLER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Returns most projectiles that are shot at him.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_KING_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}As Shakespeare once wrote, "Uneasy lies the head that wears a crown." And 僵尸 King couldn't agree more. It is incredibly difficult to get a good night's sleep with a crown on your head. That thing is all kinds of uncomfortable.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_KING_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Grants knight helms to nearby peasant zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DARK_WIZARD_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}All the zombies agree, Wizard 僵尸's powers of transmutation are impressive. But what they don't get is ... why sheep? Everyone knows it would be more helpful if the Wizard used his powers to turn plants into, say, more zombies. But yeah, no one is going to say that to his face.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: Jurassic Conehead 僵尸 is trying to get the jump on the whole "traffic cone" idea. He figures it'll be a HUGE market in about 150 million years.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Cones, or old leftover horns bundled together with string so that they look sort of like a cone, provide some middling protection.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: The real question, the burning mystery, is: where did he find blue fur for his outfit?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Crude drawings of buckets provide as much protection as the real thing.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION: Contrary to his name, Jurassic Fossilhead's fossil head isn't actually a fossil. That skull's maybe a week and a half old, tops.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Fossil skulls not only provide a huge amount of damage absorption, but are also extremely classy.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}If you were to extract DNA from the Amberhead 僵尸 and combine it with the DNA of a frog, you'd probably be breaking the law at some point.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Amberhead 僵尸's head-engulfing ball of amber provides hardened protection.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_BULLY_DESCRIPTION: Jurassic Bully is slow, stupid, and smells bad. But hey, at least he's punctual.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_BULLY_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: A trudging, damage-resistant zombie who is immune to most Primal Pea's knockback.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_BULLY_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Somebody tied rocks to Jurassic Rockpuncher's hands. Being unable to remove them (because he had rocks tied to his hands), he was left with no choice but to roll with it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_BULLY_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HE: Jurassic Rockpuncher pummels plants with rocks tied to his hands.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_DESCRIPTION: Jurassic 僵尸 is NOT primitive. See, he's wearing a tie and everything!
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Regular beard-having zombie from the unimaginable past.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: He's not only got a flag, but he's also got a can-do attitude and a fierce hunger for success. Success and brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge epochal "wave" of highly anachronistic zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Where did Jurassic Rally 僵尸 get his fancy new flag? Nobody knows. It's a mystery. The police should look into it. Or maybe we could get a fund together and hire a detective. It's a real puzzle.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HEA: Jurassic Rally 僵尸 marks the arrival of large group of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}crushes plants with bone
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}launches Jurassic Imp when damaged
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}immune to most Primal Pea's knockback

{FLAVOR}Jurassic Gargantuar wonders how there can be zombies millions of years before the advent of humanity. He doesn't let it get in the way of his plant-bashing, though.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_IMP_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can form a band together to quickly march towards your defense

{FLAVOR}This nasty little nipper can make a serious dent in your defenses if left to his own devious devices.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DINO_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: A weaker, smaller, much more vicious version of the typical Jurassic zombie.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DISCO_MECH_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}immune to knockback

{FLAVOR}After some initial problems with the sideburn suspension system, the Disco-tron 3000 went on to become the shufflin' dance-bot of doom it is today.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_DISCO_MECH_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Drops in disco Jetpack 僵尸when dropping the beat.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EGYPT_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}crushes plants with sarcophagus
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}launches Imp Mummy when damaged

{FLAVOR}True fact #1: The pyramids were built in an attempt to make Mummified Gargantuar seem small. It didn't work. True fact #2: The Sphinx isn't missing its nose... that is the face of... Gargantuar.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EGYPT_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Massive zombie from a royal line of mummies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EGYPT_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Imp Mummy prefers to laze around the tomb, hop up on the urns, and scratch at the sarcophagi. The sound of him coughing up a hairball is one you will never forget.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EGYPT_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Thrown over most of your defenses, then slinks onward.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_8BIT_DESCRIPTION: Being made out of light and positional co-ordinates has no effect on this erzatz zombie's ravenous hunger for tangy brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_8BIT_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pixelated zombie generated by super cool arcade machine. Comes in regular, cone and bucket flavors.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARCADE_DESCRIPTION: When it's a choice between quarters for games and quarters for laundry, Arcade 僵尸 is prepared to make the ultimate stinky sacrifice.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARCADE_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Pushes an arcade cabinet that spits out 8-Bit 僵尸.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: Neon Conehead 僵尸 used to be a big believer in de-evolution, but then he forgot what it meant.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Cones provide protection and focus the sound of righteous tunes.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: Neon Buckethead 僵尸 had to go all the way to the dump to find a headband he really liked.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Buckets absorb damage because that's just what they do.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_BOOMBOX_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can be summoned on the lawn
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}boom box has no effect on Spikeweeds, Spikerocks, Phat Beets and Electric Currants

{FLAVOR}Boombox 僵尸 doesn't want to buy, sell or process anything; he just really wants to consume your brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_BOOMBOX_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Holds aloft a boom box that tranquilizes all plants with its heartfelt tunes.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_BREAKDANCER_DESCRIPTION: Delivers only the freshest moves at bargain basement prices.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_BREAKDANCER_DESCRIPTION_: Kicks zombies forward when transported by the power of rap.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_DESCRIPTION: He's cutting down on his head-banging so as not to bang his head clean off.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: Fluorescent colors and little yellow plastic strips are the marks of a truly hip, groundbreaking new style of zombie wave flag.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge mixtape-making "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}crushes plants with guitar
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}bashes sonic blast when metal music plays
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}launches Impunk when damaged

{FLAVOR}Hair Metal Gargantuar only knows one chord, but you'd better believe he'll play it all night and then some.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_GLITTER_DESCRIPTION: Glitter 僵尸 inspires zombies everywhere to boogie their brains out, whether it's just one moment or maybe forever, or at least until the lights come on and they're kicking everybody out.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_GLITTER_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Trails glamorous rainbows that protect zombies behind her when she's feeling the beat.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_IMP_DESCRIPTION: Impunk's lyrics have been described as "banal," "incoherent," and "totally expressive of the Zompunk movement at its finest."
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Tossed past most of your defenses, then rocks out to your detriment.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_MC_DESCRIPTION: MC Zom-B doesn't want you to know it, but his fancy bling is really just gold-plated zinc he got from his grandma.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_MC_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Spins microphone to damage nearby plants when he's dropping his sick, sick rhymes.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_PUNK_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}Magnet Shrooms pull off his head

{FLAVOR}Punk 僵尸's piercings represent his individuality and his belief in personal freedom, or maybe just that he fell face-first into a sewing machine.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EIGHTIES_PUNK_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Moshes plants back a space when his jam is playing.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EXPLORER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}cold attacks extinguish torch

{FLAVOR}His impressive friendly mutton chops have always kept food in them for weeks, making sure his explorations are filled with snacks.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EXPLORER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Carries a torch that can instantly destroy your plants upon contact.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EXPLORER_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}cold attacks extinguish him and the torch

{FLAVOR}Torchlight 僵尸 has no fear of the dark. That's not because he's always got a torch, however, but rather because as a zombie he has no capacity for fear in the first place.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_EXPLORER_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Holds a bigger torch that immediately incinerates plants upon contact.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FOOTBALL_MECH_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}immune to most Primal Pea's knockback and freeze

{FLAVOR}Now past his prime, Mecha-Football 僵尸 is ready to be put back into the game. Until he gets some brains, concussions aren't a concern.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FOOTBALL_MECH_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pushes plants across the lawn instead of eating.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Has tried to calculate the volume of his mathematically perfect cone, but he always ends up dreaming about brain π.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His poly-polymer cone gives him thrice the toughness of regular future zombie.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Other zombies call him old-fashioned for being nostalgic for the year 2008.  It was a simpler time when brains were brains, zombies were zombies, and those punk plants kept to themselves.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His techno-bucket greatly increases his protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The force field gets its unique color from frequency harmonics and a liberal dose of purple paint.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Holo Head 僵尸's head-mounted force field provides hyper-protection.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_DESCRIPTION: Future zombies look good in red shirts. Future fact #23: Nothing bad happens to red shirts.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Sometimes Future Flag 僵尸 regrets having to be at the bleeding edge of zombie wave advancement technology.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge future-proof "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}crushes plants with arms
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}randomly burns tiles with laser eyes
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}launches 2 Bug Bots when damaged
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}immune to knockback and freeze

{FLAVOR}The imp pilots of the Gargantuar Prime series are handpicked by Dr. Zomboss himself. They are the imp elite.  The small, the mean, and the fearless! But mostly the ones who can drive a stick shift.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEA: Has it all: heavy armor, laser eyes, smashing arms, and Bug Bot deployment system.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}He always wanted to "see the world," "be his own boss," and "meet and consume interesting brains." He still doesn't understand how he got stuck in this cramped Bug Bot job 24/7.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Lands on the lawn past your defenses, then hops forward.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_JETPACK_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}floats over low plants, boosts over most other plants
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}tall blocking plants

{FLAVOR}The Jetpack 僵尸 was an early adopter during the brain acquisition tech explosion of 2113. Little did he know he would be stuck with version 1.0 of the simple jetpack.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_JETPACK_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Boosts to float over all but the tallest plant barriers.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_JETPACK_DISCO_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}floats over low plants, boosts over most other plants
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}tall blocking plants

{FLAVOR}A zombie who 'lives' for drama, he's an original cast member of the stage musical "Disco is BACK! For Revenge!" His signature dance move is "The Weed Whacker."
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_JETPACK_DISCO_DESCRIPTION_: Boosts to float over all but the tallest plant barriers, in style.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_JETPACK_VETERAN_DESCRIPTIO:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}floats over low plants, boosts over most other plants
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}tall blocking plants

{FLAVOR}Blastronaut's rocket-pack is strictly ornamental; his hovering ability comes from a deep meditative state and from being full of helium.
Blastronaut 僵尸 boosts to float over all but the tallest plants.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_PROTECTOR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}can only create shields 9 times

{FLAVOR}Shield 僵尸 developed his system using funds from a BiteStarter campaign. The push goal for pushing plants was not met.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FUTURE_PROTECTOR_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Protect himself and nearby zombies from incoming attacks with a force field.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cave Conehead 僵尸 was the first zombie to invent the cone. He lashed the horn of a mammoth to a slab of petrified wood ... and boom! A cone! The invention of the cone changed everything for the zombies. EVERYTHING.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His mammoth horn cone makes him thrice as tough as normal cave-dwellers.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cave Buckethead 僵尸 likes rocks. He likes rocks A LOT. He strapped a rock to his head and called it a bucket. None of the other Cave 僵尸know what a "bucket" is, but they like his style.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His stone "bucket" hat provides great protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}One day, a Cave 僵尸 fell head-first into a glacial stream. It had been a bad day already, so he lay there in the frigid water for a long time contemplating the insignificance of his life. When he finally stood up, he discovered that his head was encased in ice. At last, his life had meaning! He was unique! He was Blockhead 僵尸! At least, that's his story and he's sticking to it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_ARMOR3_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: The ice block on his head provides amazing protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cave 僵尸 was busy painting handprints on cave walls when he was told to start fighting plants. He's not sure why he's fighting plants, but he hopes he can get back to painting soon. He was feeling inspired. He had plans for some big pieces. Art school was finally paying off.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_DODO_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Dodo Rider believes dodos are the future of transportation. He believes a public dodo-riding system is not only a wise expenditure of tax dollars but would help the vast majority of zombies get where they need to go more efficiently. Everyone keeps telling him there's no future in dodos, but he refuses to listen.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_DODO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Dodo bird with an imp rider. The dodo can flap and jump over barricades as well as troublesome plants.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cave Flag 僵尸 has been in the flag-carrying business for a long time. It's been his life's work. He's good at it. But sometimes, just sometimes, he longs for a change. He wonders if he could be good at something else. He wonders if he could leave it all behind and start fresh. He's pretty sure he's having a mid-life crisis.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge frosty "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}crushes plants with icicle
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}fires off 3 Yeti Imps when damaged
{FLAVOR}Somewhere along the line, Sloth Gargantuar contracted a bad case of Yeti Imps. He used soap, medicinal powders, and a salve made from sloth slobber in an attempt to get rid of them ... to no avail. But the truth is, he's grown used to their presence. The darn things are itchy. They're always squabbling. They nag him endlessly. But at this point, he'd probably miss them if they ever cleared up.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEA: Massive sloth skinned zombie with a case of the imps.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_HUNTER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Shhhhh ... Hunter 僵尸 didn't actually kill that sabertooth tiger. He found the skin at a thrift store. Also, he's a vegetarian. Tell no one.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_HUNTER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 僵尸 that can throw snow balls at range to cool down plants until they freeze into blocks.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Yeti Imp recently took up knitting. He started with a scarf, moved on to mittens and eventually knitted an entire bodysuit out of hair he shaved off of Yeti 僵尸. He just loves knitting. When those needles are in his hands, he feels a sense of calm he's never felt before.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Thrown over most of your defenses, then ambles onward.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_TROGLOBITE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Troglobite has been pushing ice blocks across the tundra day in and day out for as long as he can remember. It's cold and exhausting work, and frankly, he's ready for a vacation. He'd like to go somewhere sunny and warm for a change. He'd like to relax in the sand. He hears Big Wave Beach is nice this time of year.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_TROGLOBITE_DESCRIPTION_HEA: Strong zombie that can push blocks of ice across the lawn.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BIRTHDAY_TROGLOBITE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can eat further forward and backward, but deals less damage
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}will deal heavy damage to the leftmost plant after 30 seconds if he's not eating

{FLAVOR}Mime 僵尸 hates being stuffed into a box. If you ever see him stuck in one he will fervently express his distaste in the most clear and concise way possible: angrily waving his hands around. We presume so, because he didn't say anything.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_BIRTHDAY_TROGLOBITE_DESCRIPTION_H: This mime has several tricks up his sleeves.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_WEASELHOARDER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Weasel Hoarder claims she's the one who wrote the song "Pop! Goes the Weasel." And for eons now, she's been demanding royalties for it. But everyone just ignores her. They know that Weasel Hoarder can't even carry a tune, much less write a catchy ditty about the sound vermin make when hugged a bit too tightly.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_WEASELHOARDER_DESCRIPTION_: 僵尸 hiding in a log with a pack of snow weasels. Weasels are released when her log is shattered.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ICEAGE_WEASEL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Once released, weasels run full speed even over ice floes to nibble your brains.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LEPRACHAUN_DODO_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}flies over Primal plants and certain hazards such as seeds, sap, Gold Tiles and mines

{FLAVOR}She literally came from hell - if you count hell being a dark underground cave full of deadly icicles. Although she looks crazy and destructive, she is just as silly and fun-loving as other zombie animals - playing under the snow, talking with her zombie fellows (she only knows how to speak Dodo-ean though)... the list goes on. For some reason she is deeply afraid of elder plants - nobody knows why, though.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LEPRACHAUN_DODO_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: The toughest dodo in the underground. Can't be detected by most plants unless she flies!
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: No one ever presumes that he's Dr. Unlivingstone. Just once, though, he wishes that someone would.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: His expedition cone makes him thrice as tough as normal adventurers.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: Buckethead Adventurer's greatest discovery was that one morning, without warning or reason, there was a bucket on his head.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: His rugged bucket provides considerable protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_BUG_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}Bonk Choy can kill both the bug and the zombie in one final punch

{FLAVOR}Bug 僵尸 and Bug make a great team, partly because Bug gives Bug 僵尸 great mobility, but mostly because they share an intense disinterest in horses.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_BUG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Bug carries zombie in over ground defenses and lifts him over barriers.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_CRYSTALSKULL_DESCRIPTION: Unlike the more famous crystal skulls, turquoise skulls are totally non-mysterious and common as dirt.
Uses skull to steal sun, then unleashes energy in a destructive beam.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_DESCRIPTION: Adventurer 僵尸 just went looking for a jolly good show, and somehow ended up in the Lost City. "Hmm. Yes. Quite." is all that he would say on the matter.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_EXCAVATOR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}blocks straight projectiles
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}bashes Tall-nuts instead

{FLAVOR}Excavator 僵尸 once heard a song about having a hammer. He liked the idea, but decided it was too mainstream for him - so he got a shovel. Now he's confident that he's clearly the coolest zombie, the others are just too jealous to admit it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_EXCAVATOR_DESCRIPTION_HE: Digs up plants and throws them behind him.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: Flag Adventurer 僵尸 is always shouting "Tally ho!" as he leads the charge. At least, he's shouting it in his head.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of an intrepid "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}crushes plants with big extinguished torch
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}throws Lost City Imp when damaged

{FLAVOR}Porter Gargantuar dreams of the discovery that will make him powerful and influential. Maybe then the Imps will be the one carrying him around. It's always nice to have dreams.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_IMPPORTER_DESCRIPTION: Imp Porter is stronger than he looks. He's also more charming, smarter and has a better education.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_IMPPORTER_DESCRIPTION_HE: Drops pack on Gold Tile; pack becomes tent from which zombies emerge.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Nepotism got Lost City Imp where he is. He's Bug 僵尸's second cousin thrice removed, but he parlayed that connection into a sweet gig getting carried around in a little box.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Gets tossed past most defenses, then explores on foot.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_JANE_DESCRIPTION: Wealthy beyond reason, the Parasol 僵尸 lived a life of luxury - when what she craved was a life of adventure. She funded the expedition to the Lost City and set out to see its wonders for herself, never forgetting to bring her trusty parasol. "In case it rains," she explained - but it only came out sounding like "Brains."
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_JANE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Parasol provides protection from lobbed projectiles.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_LOSTPILOT_DESCRIPTION: He faked his pilot's license and figured nobody would notice. But they did.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_RELICHUNTER_DESCRIPTION: Relic Hunter has hunted some pretty impressive relics in his day. Idols, antiques, curios... he's hunted 'em all.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_LOSTCITY_RELICHUNTER_DESCRIPTION_: Swings in past defenses, then quickly shuffles forward.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MECH_CONE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}immune to most Primal Pea's knockback and freeze

{FLAVOR}僵尸 engineers considered the orange cone the height of zombie protective technology. It wasn't until they perfected the design for the Robo-Cone that someone remembered the bucket.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MECH_CONE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: The armor-plated cone offers phenomenal protection for its pilot.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_ALLSTAR_DESCRIPTION: Football 僵尸 is a third-round draft pick and shows a lot of promise, but come on, his salary demands are beyond ridiculous for someone who still doesn't know what football is. Ten million brains per year? For FIFTY YEARS?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_ALLSTAR_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: A heavy-duty zombie who charges your defensive line.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_BALLOON_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Balloon 僵尸 has no idea where the balloon came from, but he's going with it and he's open to seeing where it takes him.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_BALLOON_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Balloon makes zombie stay high up in the air, helping him get over most barriers and ground defenses.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_NEWSPAPER_DESCRIPTION: You can't really blame him for getting so upset; he was THIS close to finishing the crossword (23 down was "Brains.")
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_NEWSPAPER_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: Newspaper protects zombie, who is then enraged when it is destroyed.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_SUPERFANIMP_DESCRIPTION: Flint Imp (not his name though) was the first one to get into fashion, and has two left feet - but that's another story. On the other day, he was looking for some decoration for his dress and found some shiny rocks. By curiosity, he tied those to the dress and somehow wrapped his hand around a bunch of straws too. Who knew it would be the perfect ingredients for a failure fashion disaster?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MODERN_SUPERFANIMP_DESCRIPTION_HE: A stylish imp with a highly flammable clothing - only triggered on his own.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Conehead Mummy 僵尸 prefers the circular cone shape over the typical pyramid shape. It's a fashion thing, and Conehead Mummy 僵尸 always stays ahead of fashion.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His cobra cone headdress makes him thrice as tough as normal mummies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Buckethead Mummy 僵尸 graduated Magna Zom Louder from 僵尸 Academy where he learned to utilize his diaphragm during groaning lessons.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His sandy bucket greatly protects him from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pyramid-Head 僵尸 isn't aware that his pyramid is pyramid-shaped. He's a little slow in that respect.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His pyramid-shaped headgear provides triangular noggin protection.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Is he a mummy? Is he a zombie? It turns out he's a zombie who's rolled himself in toilet paper to protect his fair skin. True fact!
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Egyptian Flag 僵尸 is so far behind he thinks he's in first place. He's clearly living in de-Nile.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge sandy "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Sometimes, a regular Flag Mummy 僵尸 simply isn't enough to inspire the desired amount of terror and disgust. In these instances, upgrading to the Egypt Rally 僵尸 isn't the sensible choice, it's the only choice.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_MUMMY_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HE: He celebrates with increased vigor and truculence the arrival of a new wave of bandaged baddies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_NEWSPAPER_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Sunday Edition 僵尸 REALLY loves the comics section, which is why his rage is so all-consuming when it is torn to tatters before he's finished reading it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_NEWSPAPER_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HEA: The newspaper protects zombie, who becomes enraged when it is destroyed.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PELICAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}The Pelican 僵尸 upgraded from the Seagull 僵尸 and has no regrets. No egrets, either. Just a pelican.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PELICAN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Pelican 僵尸 dashes over water without a plank and floats over low plants like Potato Mines and Iceberg Lettuces.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PHARAOH_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can withstand Cherry Bombs and other instants
{KEYWORD}Speed Details: {STAT}moves like a hungry zombie once free

{FLAVOR}The second cousin once removed of King Rot, he rose to power with his disappearing sarcophagus act, but met his untimely end in an unfortunate goat accident. His tale is told in great detail on the back of his sarcophagus, which no one will ever see.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PHARAOH_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His sarcophagus greatly protects him but slows down a rather fast zombie.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_CLEOPATRA_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}People expect Cleopatra to be a queen with sophisticated hobbies- like being a craft master, an omnious prophet or even a wine snob. Instead, we got a dance master with a penchant for cryptic hieroglyphs - talk about something subverting expectations.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIANO_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pianist 僵尸 only knows two songs, and they're both groaners.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIANO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His rolling piano crushes plants while his music causes dancing Cowboy zombies to switch lanes.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Conehead Pirate is a simple zombie. When asked what his favorite dish is, he'd think for a moment, straighten his ascot, and say, "Rrurrarrbrains." Perhaps he could borrow a cup, neighbor?
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His Jolly Roger cone makes him thrice as tough as normal pirates.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Buckethead Pirate 僵尸 is looking for his bucket. Have you seen it? It's where? Up where? Speak up, he can't hear you.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His sturdy wooden bucket provides excellent protection from damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Cannonhead 僵尸 tried to relive his childhood life once again, but he was too old to fit inside a cannon and shoot himself over the sea. Merely wanting to know the feeling, he's been sticking with it for too long, and now he can't really take it off anymore... At least, that's his headcannon when he talks about himself anyway.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Cannonhead 僵尸's cannon-like headwear provides augmented protection.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_BARREL_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}Jalapeno can destroy both the Imps and the barrel

{FLAVOR}What could it be? Could it be gold? Or some sort of other kind of treasure?  Who knows!
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_BARREL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Contains Imp 僵尸that launch out when destroyed. May contain other zombies as well.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_CAPTAIN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Pirate Captain 僵尸 isn't actually a captain. His dry cleaning got mixed up with someone else's, but he thought he looked cool with an eye patch.  Plus, the parrot already knew his name, so he just went with it.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_CAPTAIN_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His parrot pet can fly away with your stolen plant and then return to him.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_CAPTAIN_PARROT_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}He's a third generation aviation revolutionary. He wants to serve his pirate brethren like his father and his grandmother, Salty Anne, before him.
Quickly flies from the Captain to carry away a plant from any lane.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Keeping up with the latest pirate trends is always tricky, but remember, he was planking before it was cool.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Marks the arrival of a huge salty "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Jolly Roger 僵尸 and his flag are fused together into a single brain-munching unit. Their teamwork is an inspiration to ghouls everywhere.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_H: Jolly Roger 僵尸 marks the arrival of lots and lots of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}使用鲨鱼砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}fires off Pirate Imp when damaged

{FLAVOR}Gargantuar Pirate likes short walks off the plank, moonlit raiding parties, and the smell of cannon fire. A true romantic.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEA: Enormous zombie who redefines the shark attack.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}He was a bootblack, with a side trade as a pickpocket on the streets of London, but all he stole were oversized footwear. "Time to steal some booty!" was his catchphrase.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PIRATE_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Prefers the compact space of barrels, both cannon and rolling.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PONCHO_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Are the zombies becoming vegetarians? Do they even like eating plants? That's still a mystery of PvZ, but this guy will surely find and eat every plant he encounters! To him, the lawn is his all-you-can-eat buffet. Other zombies told him that he should try brains sometimes, but he was offended by that.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PONCHO_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Charges into the battlefield, quickly eating everything on his way - even underground and hidden plants.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PONCHO_PLATE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}There are three things that he hates the most. One, losing his most prized possession - his grate. The poncho is there just to protect it from getting rusty. Two, losing his mechanical horse. Three, being compared with his brother. Seriously - he's not the one who eats plants like there's no tomorrow.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PONCHO_PLATE_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Sometimes has a hidden armored plate.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PROSPECTOR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}appears on the left side of the lawn after dynamite explodes

{FLAVOR}"There once was a zombie who got old, spending all his days looking for gold.  'Til one day in the rain, he finally ate brains... and, wait, where's his other shoe?"
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_PROSPECTOR_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Launches over your defenses when his fuse burns down.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_RA_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}太阳神僵尸 isn't actually named after the Sun God Ra, though that's a common mistake. He just likes to say "Ra" a lot.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_RA_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Tries to steal sun, just for safe keeping.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_SEAGULL_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}海鸥僵尸 has racked up the frequent flier miles and dreams of going to the top colleges in the world on a cerebral gastronomy vacation.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_SEAGULL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Crosses watery gaps without a plank and flies over low plants like Potato Mines and Iceberg Lettuces.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_SWASHBUCKLER_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}can appear in large number during a raid

{FLAVOR}He swashes. He buckles. But, he also writes home every third Sunday and sends brains and treasure via post. He's a good zombie at heart.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_SWASHBUCKLER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Swings in on a rope to land midway onto your lawn.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TOMB_RAISER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}He dreams about playing fetch, running for the brains. He loves burying himself in the yard, and is not yet indoor trained. He's still looking for his tail.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TOMB_RAISER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Throws out bones to create tombstones on the lawn.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TREASUREYETI_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Speed Details: {STAT}runs away after a short while
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}carries treasure

{FLAVOR}The rare and wondrous Yeti carries his lunch box up and down Mount Brainer to his isolated mountain lodge.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TREASUREYETI_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: A rare and curious creature, he always packs a lunch.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}After a wild night, Conehead 僵尸 woke up holding a mysterious receipt for a cone and industrial strength adhesive.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR1_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: His traffic cone headpiece makes him thrice as tough as normal zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}There was a time when Buckethead 僵尸 was hailed as a zombie genius for his innovative bucket-on-head strategy. It's been a few years, though, and zombies wonder if he's got any surprises left. His secret? He doesn't.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR2_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: His bucket hat makes him extremely resistant to damage.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}After consultation with various storybook wolves, it was determined that straw helmets and wood helmets were not up to snuff, and that brick helmets had to be seriously considered.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_ARMOR4_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Brickhead 僵尸's brick head provides thorough brickheaded brickheadness.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Basic 僵尸 hates the term "Basic." He doesn't  consider himself some generic foe or common corpse. He's an individual, darn it, and he's going to make a difference even if it kills you.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_FLAG_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}A spelling impaired zombie named "Brian," 旗帜僵尸 keeps thinking the rest of the zombies are talking to him. At least he feels important.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_FLAG_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: His flag marks the arrival of a huge pile or "wave" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_FLAG_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Rally 僵尸 splurged on the all-leather flag because, heck, he's worth it.
Rally 僵尸 and his flag marks the arrival of a large clot or "pile" of zombies.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用电线杆砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受到伤害时扔出小鬼僵尸

{FLAVOR}Gargantuar is the embodiment of power, made real. He is a juggernaut of hunger, from which there is no escape. He is fear unleashed. Well, he's fear slightly leashed.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_H: Gargantuar really is kind of a big deal.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FEASTIVUS_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}用交通标志砸扁植物
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}受到伤害时扔出路障头小鬼僵尸
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}免疫击退

{FLAVOR}All the time spent on dumpster diving has finally paid off for him. Although he didn't find any brains, he did get a sweet new ride that still worked! Then he proceeded to rip it apart for an armor set anyway, because Zomboss already invented teleportation and who even drives anymore? Wait...
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FEASTIVUS_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_: 这个全副武装的巨人僵尸即将在你的草坪上制造混乱
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}What he lacks in reach he more than makes up for with his bad attitude, or zombadittude as he likes to call it. Don't encourage him.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_TUTORIAL_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Is hurled onto the lawn past your defenses, then shuffles ahead.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FEASTIVUS_IMP_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}When the Imp first met a Conehead 僵尸, he discovered himself another whole controversial mystery of the universe.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_FEASTIVUS_IMP_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Is thrown past most of your defenses, then strides to your house.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_VASE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}crushes plants with pole
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}throws Imp when damaged
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}does not outrange Chard Guard

{FLAVOR}The ceramic confines of the Vase Gargantuar's home has done nothing to his endless hunger, his immense power, or his vast destructive potential. However, his footspeed could be better.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_VASE_GARGANTUAR_DESCRIPTION_HEADE: Phenomenally sized zombie stuffed into a tiny unliving space.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULLRIDER_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Had dreams of becoming a rodeo clown but found the clown make-up to just be too creepy.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULLRIDER_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: Gets launched past all but the tallest plants, then proceeds on foot.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULL_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}弱点: {STAT}Tall-nut blocks flying imp

{FLAVOR}He's not an angry bull. He loves flowers, playing in the fields, sitting under trees, and long walks across the pasture. He wants to settle down when he meets the right cow. Too bad he's a robot.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULL_DESCRIPTION_HEADER: 可以投射小鬼越过你的大部分防御.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULL_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}"Legend" perhaps overstates Rodeo Legend 僵尸's status in the rodeo world. Don't tell him that, though, unless you're desperate to hear an hour-long tirade about calf-roping.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_WEST_BULL_VETERAN_DESCRIPTION_HEA: 传奇斗牛僵尸撞击植物, 并且投射小鬼越过你的大部分防御.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_BEACH_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}mouth turbine can pull plants to it
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}summoned zombie sharks can consume plants

{FLAVOR}The Zombot Sharktronic Sub is a true labor of love. Dr. Zomboss obsessed over every detail of the aquatic mechanism of doom as he worked on it day in and day out from the wee hours of the morning until well after dark. He carefully handcrafted the shark's nearly impenetrable exterior skin. He shaved each razor-sharp tooth to a point by hand. And he painstakingly installed the lethal plant-consuming fan inside the machine's horrific maw all by himself. Zomboss shed more than one tear of joy when his masterpiece was complete. Say what you will about the evil genius, but he is passionate about his projects.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_BEACH_DESCRIPTION_HEA: The ravenous engine of carnage from the murky depths.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_COWBOY_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}missile attacks can target mine carts

{FLAVOR}Ranchers and farmhands abandon your fields. Rumbling down the dusty trail, this wagon was engineered to strike fear into the heart of any horticulturist who should encounter it. Dr. Zomboss normally doesn't take any bull, but this time he made an exception.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_COWBOY_DESCRIPTION_HE: The stagecoach of destruction from the western wilds.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_DARK_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}Damage: {STAT}fire breathing attacks destroy plants
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}lobbed fireballs can hatch Imp Dragon 僵尸

{FLAVOR}With a rumble of destruction, Dr. Zomboss forged his Dark Dragon in the heart of a volcano. Then he tempered the beast in the chilled waters of Doom Lake. Finally  he fed its furnace with coal from the Mines of Morbidity. And the paint job - that was done by Carl.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_DARK_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: The desolator of all, from dark times.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_DINO_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}summons dinosaurs

{FLAVOR}With flagrant disregard for temporal tidiness and simple good taste, Dr. Zomboss figured it would be a good idea to build a big metal dinosaur.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_DINO_DESCRIPTION_HEAD: A mechanical means of dinosaurian destruction.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_EGYPT_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}missile attack can create tombstones

{FLAVOR}To add that extra bit of wickedness to the Sphinx-inator Dr. Zomboss chiseled his creation from the stonework of cursed tombs. You should not take this instance of reuse and recycle to mean he's going green. The only thing green about him is his tongue.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_EGYPT_DESCRIPTION_HEA: The destroyer of plants from the ancient sands.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_EIGHTIES_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}speakers do passive damage (except to ground plants and Phat Beet) and send out shockwave attacks

{FLAVOR}In another world, in another time, Dr. Zomboss would receive the bounty of enthusiastic applause that is his due. Not here and now, though. Nope.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_EIGHTIES_DESCRIPTION_: An intimate evening with some of Dr. Zomboss' most recent and painful explorations.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_FUTURE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}missile attacks can destroy Power Tiles

{FLAVOR}When Dr. Zomboss is nestled into the comfy folds of his futuristic cerebral control pod he almost finds it hard to be evil. Of course once he sees a lawn full of happy plants that puts him right back where he needs to be, hungry and evil.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_FUTURE_DESCRIPTION_HE: The Power Tile crushing creation from the Far Future.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_ICEAGE_DESCRIPTION: {FLAVOR}Dr. Zomboss was real impressed with himself when he came up with the idea to build a weaponized woolly mammoth with the power to blast snow and ice out of its mechanical trunk. But what Dr. Zomboss didn't realize until it was too late: He's allergic to mammoth fur. Now he has to load up on allergy medication every time he wants to take the darn thing out for a spin.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_ICEAGE_DESCRIPTION_HE: The mammoth mech with an ice blast from the past.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_LOSTCITY_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT} drops zombies and bags o' sand

{FLAVOR}After repeated failures with variously robotic engines of destruction, Dr. Zomboss decided to go with a kinder, more eco-friendly lighter-than-air option to sow disaster and discord.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_LOSTCITY_DESCRIPTION_: The floating fortress from the skies above.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_PIRATE_DESCRIPTION:
{KEYWORD}特点: {STAT}cannon can rain down imps past your defenses

{FLAVOR}"Hoist the mizzenmast, batten down the hatches! 15 zombies on a dead man's boat, yo ho ho and a bucket of brains!" Dr. Zomboss had to admit he was really getting into this whole pirate thing. Though he never thought he'd be on a boat on a boat.
LocStringValues.ZOMBIE_ZOMBOSSMECH_PIRATE_DESCRIPTION_HE: The plant plundering privateer of the high seas.
